Name: Asimov
Content: First, let me give you some simple instructions.

Name: Asimov
Content: Your current mission objective is displayed in the top-left corner of your vision. Your progress will be updated in real-time.

Name: Asimov
Content: We need to explore the virtual space inside Gestalt to find the source of its deviation.

Name: Asimov
Content: Time is running out, so let's finish the investigation in Redundant Block 22-16!

Name: Asimov
Content: Before you now is the battle interface created by the Spear of F.O.S. after its tactic optimization and digitization.

Name: Asimov
Content: [Advance] indicates the safest path it can come up with after analyzing your environment, so start exploring that way.

Name: Asimov
Content: It will also stop you from entering the area. It might be a little harsh, but it's for your safety.

Name: Asimov
Content: Just go around the [Block] area when you see them.

Name: Asimov
Content: Sometimes you will find blind spots with unidentified data. Accidents are prone to happen there, so the Spear of F.O.S. has labeled them with [Block].

Name: Asimov
Content: You're getting the hang of it pretty quick. Now's your turn to make your own tactical decisions.

Name: Asimov
Content: Uncertain events create hazards on the field. Your system will label them with an orange area.

Name: Asimov
Content: Before you confront them, you should send the right [Connector] to perform [Calculation].

Name: Asimov
Content: The Spear of F.O.S. will analyze and categorize the different [Connector] powers and strengths into three groups.

Name: Asimov
Content: Different tactics come with different risk levels. They will be labeled at the bottom of the calculations.

Name: Asimov
Content: Based on the assessment from the Spear of F.O.S., calculating with [Perception] in our current event will generate higher risks.

Name: Asimov
Content: It might be a little too abstract for you to understand, so let's take the situation you are in as an example.

Name: Asimov
Content: After deciding on a tactic, choose [Confirm] and enter the calculation phase.

Name: Asimov
Content: What displays here is the risk level when you perform the tactic.

Name: Asimov
Content: For Lee, the Spear of F.O.S. has designated him as a Connector that excels in [Arithmetic]... Well, that's pretty accurate.

Name: Asimov
Content: And the assessment rating easily exceeds the risk level. Not too bad.

Name: Asimov
Content: After confirming the Connector you choose, click [Begin Emulation] to plan how your tactic will play out.

Name: Asimov
Content: Click [Confirm Result] afterward to find out what happens when you perform the tactic in your calculation.

Name: Asimov
Content: We are nearly at the end of this area. Nothing seems to be out of the ordinary so far.

Name: Asimov
Content: ...Unidentified data, but it doesn't seem to be the culprit of Gestalt's deviations.

Name: Asimov
Content: I'll record it to study later. Now, click [Confirm Result] to finish this calculation.

Name: Asimov
Content: Not bad. You're adapting quite quickly. This will buy us some time.

Name: Asimov
Content: The situation remains urgent. After confirming that there is no abnormality with the last part here, immediately proceed to the next area.

Name: Asimov
Content: Compared to theories, actual experiences will let you attune to the Spear of F.O.S. much faster.

Name: Asimov
Content: Let's start your investigation with Redundant Block 22-16. It's the closest Block from where you've immersed.

Name: Asimov
Content: Head to the safer path and [Advance].

Name: Asimov
Content: Calculate your chosen tactic, and the Spear of F.O.S. will assess your plan and project the possible outcome.

Name: Asimov
Content: Your options are [Battle], [Perception], and [Arithmetic] respectively.

Name: Asimov
Content: Let's approach it with [Arithmetic] and perform the calculation.

Name: Asimov
Content: In front of you is a data fault. If we want to calculate it with [Arithmetic]...

Name: Asimov
Content: Use the right equation to calculate the formation sequence of the fault, find its origin point by how it's arranged, and then activate the sequence.

Name: Asimov
Content: This operation cannot fail. If you do, Gestalt will likely consider your action an anomaly invasion and proceed to eliminate you.

Name: Asimov
Content: So before you execute your tactic, it's much safer to find out the best equation for the [Arithmetic] program first.

Name: Asimov
Content: The Spear of F.O.S. will also provide a numerical rating for your Connector's tactic, allowing you to determine the feasibility of your plan.

Name: Asimov
Content: Try coming up with a tactic that rates higher than the risk level!

Name: Asimov
Content: In a moment, the Spear of F.O.S. will rate our plan and compare it to the risk level.

Content: Welcome to Devour Wave Escape! In this mission, you need to escape from the virus and clear the entire chapter within the time limit.

Name: Celica
Content: You can only challenge one chapter at a time. Tap here to start.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=39>In every level, you can choose between Easy and Hard stages. You can get higher points from Hard stages. After clearing a stage, try to get as many points as possible!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>In each chapter, you can only choose one team. Once a stage is cleared, the chapter's remaining time, character HP and Energy will be recorded and carried over to the next stage, so choose your team carefully.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: The tutorial stage for Uniframe has been unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to Operation Uniframe! This operation consists of 3 Combat Areas and 1 Central Area.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the first Combat Area.

Name: Celica
Content: Before entering the battle, let's learn about the special rating system for this mission.

Name: Celica
Content: The Energy Supply Level of an area will increase when you complete the stage in this area.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>The point bonus of the Central Area increases with the area's Energy Supply Level. The Energy Supply Level of an area reaches the maximum when all the stages within the area are completed.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: The battle in Central Area is measured in points. Let's play the tutorial first.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Welcome to <color=#FF0000>Plum Snow</color>, in which you will control characters to solve puzzles and complete missions. Before you start, you may tap here to select from chapters.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Different characters may have different special skills. Refer to the skill descriptions and illustrations for more details.

Name: Celica
Content: This is the character you're controlling.

Name: Celica
Content: Swipe the screen to move your character until the Construct hits an obstacle.

Name: Celica
Content: This is your destination, which is closed now. You can pass through it before it opens.

Name: Celica
Content: The Kuroro with a mark is the <color=#57f0fb>key</color> to clearing the stage. Once you hit it, it will be destroyed and your destination will open.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the image guide for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Please select an operation stage first. I'll explain the rules after you enter the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's start, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: <size=34>Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Winter Sequence</color>. In this operation, you need to carefully plan the tactical resources within each stage. Train and use the <color=#57f0fb>Defensive Devices</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Assist Units</color> to stop and eliminate the Corrupted!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Supplies for enhancement will be sent by Babylonia <color=#57f0fb>at fixed time intervals</color>. Unclaimed supplies will be wasted. Claim your first supply now.

Name: Celica
Content: Once you have enough supplies, you can spend them on training in Battle Deployment.

Name: Celica
Content: In the Talent bar, you can select a Combat Talent for the unit.

Name: Celica
Content: Now let's configure <color=#57f0fb>Assist Unit - Hunter</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: In Defense Deployment, you can train and select 2 <color=#57f0fb>Defensive Devices</color> to assist you in battle.

Name: Celica
Content: You can select 1 <color=#57f0fb>Assist Unit</color> to fight along your side.

Name: Celica
Content: The Hunter Enhancement allows you to train and select 3 Hunting Add-ons for <color=#57f0fb>Assist Units</color> to boost their abilities.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the image guide for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=36>Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Mycenaean Protocol - Prophetic Surveillance</color>! This operation consists of 50 stages with increasing difficulties. You will need to challenge them with provided trial characters.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view the various abilities of enemies. Tap an icon to view the Affix details.

Name: Celica
Content: After clearing a stage, you will get <color=#57f0fb>Promotion Certificate</color> to level up your team.

Name: Celica
Content: After leveling up your team, you can enhance the members' abilities through <color=#57f0fb>Member Modification</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Leveling up your team will increase the base stats and skill levels of all members, as well as granting them bonus enhanced abilities.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Every character has two modification paths, namely <color=#57f0fb>Solo Battle</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Swap Battle</color>. Each path refers to a different combat style. Let's select <color=#57f0fb>Solo Battle</color></size> first.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=34>After reaching the required level, you can unlock powerful character enhancements. To enhance a character, <color=#57f0fb>Modification Points</color> are required. <color=#57f0fb>Modification Points</color> can only be earned through increasing your team level.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Tap <color=#57f0fb>activate</color> to gain the corresponding enhancement. Once activated, you can reset the enhancement at any time, and all the Modification Points used will be refunded.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the image guide for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Spectroscopic Binary Star</color>. This operation consists of 5 chapters. Each chapter will become available over time according to your progress.

Name: Celica
Content: In this operation, all classes will gain extra <color=#57f0fb>Special Skills</color>. Commandants can choose to swap the different skills.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's click the first chapter.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=34>The first 3 chapters are divided into <color=#57f0fb>2 paths</color>. Each path comes with different stages and mechanisms, and the last stage is only unlocked when both paths are cleared.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the chosen stage to check its mechanisms.

Name: Celica
Content: Pay attention to the stage description. It describes in detail the special mechanisms found in this stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, welcome to Babylonia's special party—<color=#57f0fb>Disco Panini</color>! You can listen to music, DJ, and dance here!

Name: Celica
Content: The different songs at the party will become available over time. You can participate in this mode anytime.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, let me give you some pointers on the party so you can join in the fun sooner.

Name: Celica
Content: I've prepared some equipment for you that you may use when needed.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=34>You will certainly find yourself using this Calibrator. You can adjust the rhythm and tempo with it. Right now, it is set to our default setting. Changing the value will impact your gameplay experience.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: You can always adjust the value in this equipment interface or the Determine Alteration stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Extremis Collaboration</color>. This operation requires 3 commandants to work together to take down the Boss as quickly as possible.

Name: Celica
Content: This mode consists of 3 themes, each becoming available over time. Different themes come with different challenge mechanisms.

Name: Celica
Content: Each theme comes with its own Team/Personal Ranking. You will receive Ranking Rewards based on your performance when the event is over.

Name: Celica
Content: Talent Skills consist of Active, Passive, and Core Attack Skills.

Name: Celica
Content: Entering FEVER Mode with Core Attacks will provide your team with buffs according to your class.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to check the mechanisms.

Name: Celica
Content: Familiarize yourself with the mechanisms and clear the stage with 3★ to gain all the computation power!

Name: Celica
Content: Multiplayer missions are now available.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=36>Each theme has <color=#57f0fb>5</color> levels of difficulty. Clearing a difficulty will unlock the next one. You can only increase your rank with Level 5, so aim to clear it!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can select the class you want to match with. You will be prioritized to match with your chosen class upon entry.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to Operation Uniframe! This operation consists of 3 Combat Areas and 1 Central Area.

Name: Celica
Content: Before entering the battle, let's learn about the special rating system for this mission.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to the <color=#57f0fb>Eden Festival (2023)</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Stamps</color> can be obtained from <color=#57f0fb>Festival Preparation</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Check out the profiles of the <color=#57f0fb>contestants</color> and the commandants' <color=#57f0fb>Cheer Ranking</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: During the Festival, you can use different <color=#57f0fb>Stamps</color> to <color=#57f0fb>vote</color> to increase each contestant's Cheer Points.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to choose a <color=#57f0fb>Helper</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's tap <color=#57f0fb>Go</color> to enter the stage first.

Name: Celica
Content: Add to Team

Name: Celica
Content: Fulfilling <color=#57f0fb>the best Helper requirements</color> will reward you with additional <color=#57f0fb>True Love Stamps</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: This time, you can consume <color=#57f0fb>a character's Mood</color> to dispatch the character to complete the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>Preparation Mission</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Contact Helper to find more <color=#57f0fb>characters</color> or gift them <color=#57f0fb>Cheer Supplies</color> to replenish their Mood.

Name: Celica
Content: Select the Helpers you need and contact them!

Name: Celica
Content: You can use the <color=#57f0fb>Joy</color> you obtained from voting to draw mystery boxes at the Tea Stall.

Name: Celica
Content: Good luck!

Name: Celica
Content: After obtaining all core rewards from the current Mystery Box Device, the subsequent Devices will be activated

Name: Celica
Content: You can obtain the daily available <color=#57f0fb>Festival Stamps</color> in <color=#57f0fb>Speed Racer</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: In Speed Racer, you can only use the characters you have obtained from <color=#57f0fb>Contact Helper</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's get you familiarized with the rules.

Name: Celica
Content: Enter the challenge after you select a character.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Welcome to the <color=#57f0fb>KI.GAL Archives</color>. During this operation, you need to assemble an elite squad, <color=#57f0fb>forming and training Bonds</color> in your team to tackle the challenges on the way.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Let's first recruit a set of <color=#57f0fb>core members</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=34>Each set of core members comes with a powerful skill. <color=#57f0fb>It only activates if you deploy at least 1 core member</color> after you select it. You can <color=#57f0fb>freely swtich between your core members</color> later. Switching them will dimiss the current core member.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: You have to refresh before recruiting new members every time. <color=#57f0fb>Refresh Attempts</color> are gained <color=#57f0fb>over time/by clearing stages</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=40>Click on the portraits of the recruited characters to view details and <color=#57f0fb>change coatings (owned characters only)</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=36>Tap here to check the basic status of the <color=#57f0fb>current Bond</color>. Pay attention to <color=#57f0fb>whether the member you want to recruit fits the current Bond of your team</color> to enhance your team's Battle Power more effectively.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: A Bond's basic status includes <color=#57f0fb>the Stars it requires to rank up, the number of members it requires to activate</color>, and more. You can also view those details by tapping the Bond icon on any random module.

Name: Celica
Content: You need to <color=#57f0fb>assemble all the members with a Bond to activate it</color>. After activation, pay attention to the <color=#57f0fb>Active Bond</color> and the <color=#57f0fb>Rank-up Requirements</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can now recruit members, mixing and matching them freely to form Bonds and tackle different challenges!

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>United Command Bureau</color>. You can control your character here to interact with other commandants.

Name: Celica
Content: Use the <color=#57f0fb>joystick</color> to <color=#57f0fb>move</color> your character.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>switch your character</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>perform special actions</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>number of players</color> in the current channel is displayed here. Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>switch to a different channel</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The original functions of the Command Bureau have been integrated. You can perform them through <color=#57f0fb>Quick Actions</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: We are still testing the new United Command Bureau currently. You can tap here to <color=#57f0fb>switch to the old interface</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Ultimate Brawl</color>. Tap here to unlock <color=#57f0fb>the new Division</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Here are the <color=#57f0fb>rules</color> for the new Division.

Name: Celica
Content: When a Division becomes available, <color=#57f0fb>a new Super Core will unlock</color>. Each character can <color=#57f0fb>have 1 Super Core equipped and obtain its powerful skills</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>train the Super Cores that you have unlocked</color> in each Division here.

Name: Celica
Content: You can switch the <color=#57f0fb>map</color> for the current battle here.

Name: Celica
Content: You can preview the scene here. <color=#57f0fb>Different scenes may provide different effects</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can add other <color=#57f0fb>members</color> to join the current battle here.

Name: Celica
Content: You can select the opponents of this battle here. <color=#57f0fb>If left unselected, your opponents will be randomized</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Member Preparation</color> before the battle to <color=#57f0fb>equip Super Cores</color> to your members.

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>equip 1 unlocked Super Core</color> to the current character here.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Welcome to Ultimate Brawl. You can tap to unlock a new Division.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here you can see the rules about a new Division.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>When a Division becomes available, a new Super Core will unlock. Each character can have 1 Super Core equipped and obtain its powerful skills.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Gain Energy Sources in each fight against an opponent. Receive a certain number of Energy Sources each day, which improves your Super Cores when used. Gain materials to evolve your Cores after defeating your first opponent.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here, you can train the Super Cores that you have unlocked in each Division.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Let's start the battle now, Commandant!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here, you can add allies to join the current battle.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here, you can select the opponents of this battle. If left unselected, your opponents will be random.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Now, tap here and equip Super Cores to our allies!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here, you can select a map for the current battle.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here, you can select an Environment for the current battle.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>The Environment will change the difficulty but also increase the number of Energy Sources you obtain upon victory.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Commandant, let's check them out!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>Here, you can equip 1 unlocked Super Core to the current character.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>For details, please see the Image Guide.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Simulated Siege</color> consist of surrounding Areas and a Central Area. Let's learn about the surrounding Areas first.

Name: Celica
Content: Saving combat data for the first time will <color=#57f0fb>trigger the corresponding skill</color>. The number of triggers available is shared between the members of the Command Bureau. Once it is out, the skill will no longer be triggered.

Name: Celica
Content: After successfully saving your combat data, you will trigger the corresponding skill and deal <color=#57f0fb>the same amount of damage</color> to the Siege Target.

Name: Celica
Content: For each Area, combat data can be saved <color=#57f0fb>3 times</color> in the Mission Summary interface during each round of the event. Choose carefully, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the Central Area to reach the current <color=#57f0fb>Siege Target</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Defeating the Siege Target will grant all members of the Command Bureau <color=#57f0fb>extra points bonus</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Unlock more difficult challenges based on the <color=#57f0fb>record highest score</color> of the Command Bureau.

Name: Celica
Content: Commander-in-Chief and the second-in-command can set the difficulty of the next phase. The higher the difficulty, the more challenging the Boss, and the higher the <color=#57f0fb>point bonus percentage</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Immunopolis</color>. As the leader of Scavengers, you will guide other people to survive till the end and complete the missions.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to choose a stage. This event consists of <color=#57f0fb>6 stages</color>, which unlock over time according to your progress.

Name: Celica
Content: Clear a stage by completing its <color=#57f0fb>main objective</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to start the first stage. <color=#57f0fb>Your stage progress will be saved</color> if you leave halfway. You can resume the game from the save point later.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Different events</color> may take place during a stage. They may cause your resources to change or have further impacts.

Name: Celica
Content: The different options for the event are displayed at the bottom. Tap <color=#57f0fb>Select</color> to choose an option and complete the event.

Name: Celica
Content: Here is your <color=#57f0fb>camp</color>. You need to assign idle Scavengers to start working.

Name: Celica
Content: This is the <color=#57f0fb>ruin</color>. Assign enough manpower to work in it to gain Wood and Iron.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap on the <color=#57f0fb>empty area</color> to select the building to create. You will need to invest materials and time to complete the building. Upon completion, it will generate resources or other income.

Name: Celica
Content: Building an <color=#57f0fb>Outpost</color> will unlock the Explore function in the lower left corner.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's explore outside the camp!

Name: Celica
Content: Before you start exploring, you must first <color=#57f0fb>form an Exploration Team</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You may consume a certain number of <color=#57f0fb>supplies and Scavengers</color> to form an exploration team.

Name: Celica
Content: Once the team is formed, open this page again to check the team's inventory or send the team back to the camp to <color=#57f0fb>recycle the resources they have found</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap on an <color=#57f0fb>explorable location</color> to view more details.

Name: Celica
Content: Each location <color=#57f0fb>has a chance</color> to have different supplies. When a location is explored for the first time, these resources will <color=#57f0fb>all be collected</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Dispatch the right team to explore based on the <color=#57f0fb>team status</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Once the team is selected, tap <color=#57f0fb>Explore</color>. The team will arrive at the destination on <color=#57f0fb>the next day</color>, trigger the events in the location, and collect resources.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Limit Break</color>, Commandant! Tap here to see the details of each stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Modify</color> to alter the current stage. Earn <color=#57f0fb>points</color> after clearing the stage based on the modification level.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to change the <color=#57f0fb>enemies</color> appearing in the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: The more dangerous the enemies are, the more <color=#57f0fb>points</color> you will earn.

Name: Celica
Content: Next, let's take a look at <color=#57f0fb>Affix modification</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap an enemy to add an Affix to the corresponding enemies in the stage. <color=#57f0fb>The greater the effects of the Affix are, the more points you can earn</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, let's take a look at <color=#57f0fb>Environment</color> modification.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to choose the <color=#57f0fb>Environment</color>. Environmental effects impact the battle for everyone.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>save your modifications</color> after you are done.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the modified points and the accumulated points of the current stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to increase the number of <color=#57f0fb>extra waves</color> in the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to increase the <color=#57f0fb>number of extra enemies</color> during the corresponding waves in the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Limit-2</color> has been unlocked. You now have access to a new modification.

Name: Celica
Content: You have fulfilled the requirements to unlock the Auto Clear function in this Mine. Auto Clear will be available to you in future battles.

Name: Celica
Content: Go straight to the Deep Hive and Auto Clear the area.

Name: Celica
Content: Auto Clear will be available for Redstone Mine and Southern Mine (the first and second Mines) upon clearing those stages. You can skip these minor annoyances in the future, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: You can even unlock the Auto Clear function for Groening Mine (the third Mine) after completing all [Challenge Missions].

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the <color=#57f0fb>mission rewards</color> of the current Norman Revival Plan.

Name: Celica
Content: Don't forget! The Ore production is still affected by the <color=#57f0fb>duration of your participation </color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Power Station will supply <color=#57f0fb>Electricity</color> for improving Battle Power in team interface.

Name: Celica
Content: Extra electricity load can be improved by deploying <color=#57f0fb>Assist Members</color>, but the assist members can no longer fight in field

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Electricity is generated by both <color=#57f0fb>systems</color> and <color=#57f0fb>characters</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Systems</color> can only generate a limited amount of Electricity during Challenge Missions, while <color=#57f0fb>characters</color> are not affected.

Name: Celica
Content: All mission requirements are related to <color=#57f0fb>clearing the stages</color> only. You don't have to worry about missing out on rewards because you couldn't participate in time, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Inner World</color>. This event consists of <color=#57f0fb>five chapters</color>. Each chapter will become available over time according to your progress.

Name: Celica
Content: Each chapter includes <color=#57f0fb>two phases</color>. Complete the Downstream Phase to proceed to the Upstream Phase.

Name: Celica
Content: You have to complete multiple stages in each chapter. Each stage includes <color=#57f0fb>two</color> sets of enemies.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose one set to challenge, and face the other set during the next phase.

Name: Celica
Content: Each set of enemies has an elemental weakness. Tap to view more details.

Name: Celica
Content: You will need to complete the stages in reverse order during the Upstream Phase.

Name: Celica
Content: In each stage, you will face the enemies you <color=#57f0fb>did not fight</color> in the corresponding stage previously.

Name: Celica
Content: Gain <color=#57f0fb>Vision Points</color> after clearing each stage during the Upstream Phase. Claim rewards after accumulating the required points for the chapter.

Name: Celica
Content: Enemies in each stage will gain <color=#57f0fb>all Mirage Features from the previous stages</color> of the same phase.

Name: Celica
Content: You can tap here to <color=#57f0fb>block</color> some of the features if you find the stage too challenging.

Name: Celica
Content: Blocking the features will affect how many Vision Points you gain upon clearing the stage, but you can block one feature <color=#57f0fb>for free</color> in each stage.

Name: Celica
Content: After completing all the day's tasks, you can tap <color=#57f0fb>End the day</color> to advance time.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the <color=#57f0fb>Weather Forecast</color> for today and the next four days. Different weathers will impact the rate stats and resources change differently.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose between <color=#57f0fb>Coordinated Attack and Solo Enhancement</color> based on your preference.

Name: Celica
Content: You can pick the skill you like after choosing a School. Due to a limit in computing power, you can only equip up to <color=#57f0fb>three skills</color> before entering a battle.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Beginner Missions</color> are now available. Complete them to claim <color=#57f0fb>lots of Black Cards</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Guide</color> missions offer <color=#57f0fb>Upgrade EXP</color>, high-quality equipment, and <color=#57f0fb>character of your choice</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Once you have completed 21 missions, you can claim an <color=#57f0fb>S-Rank Character Choice Pack</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete specific missions to receive your rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to switch to the <color=#57f0fb>target</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete <color=#57f0fb>target</color> missions to earn Black Cards, <color=#57f0fb>one of the game's key currencies</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Daily Missions unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: Daily Missions are one of the best ways to earn Black Cards.

Name: Celica
Content: Reach the required Activity to claim rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Memories</color> greatly enhance a member's combat ability. Let's take a look at their Memory setup.

Name: Celica
Content: The equipment system consists of <color=#57f0fb>Weapons</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Memories</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the Memory tab.

Name: Celica
Content: Each frame can equip up to <color=#57f0fb>6 Memories</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Different Memories have different <color=#57f0fb>set effects</color>. Equip the required number of Memories to activate those effects.

Name: Celica
Content: Memory also provides <color=#57f0fb>base stat bonuses</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Enhance Memories to gain higher base stat bonuses.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Memory upgrade materials can be obtained in large amounts from the Simulated Battlefield</color>. Upgrade your Memories to the max level!

Name: Celica
Content: Nanami does not have enough battle experience. Please power her up first.

Name: Mysterious Girl
Content: Select enough [EXP Materials].

Name: Mysterious Girl
Content: Nanami has joined your team. Add her to the team's [Yellow Location].

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, add the new Construct to your team and begin the battle.

Name: Nanami

Name: Celica
Content: Give characters an Astro-Mystery Box as a present in their Character Story to unlock the character's <color=#57f0fb>Valentine's Day story</color>.
Welcome, Outlander!
Without further ado, let our journey begin.
Choose wisely the <color=#57f0fb>Adventure Difficulty</color> according to your current abilities. The higher the difficulty, the better the rewards, yep.
Let's start with the easiest one. Here we go!
First off, we're going to <color=#57f0fb>set up our Survey Team</color>. This will definitely help us on our journey.
You may get lonely going on an adventure alone, so let's <color=#57f0fb>invite some friends</color> to join us on this journey!
Now we can begin <color=#57f0fb>Recruitment</color>.
If you're not satisfied with the current companions, tap <color=#57f0fb>Refresh</color> to view another group.
Choose a companion.

Successfully recruiting a companion will activate Bond. <color=#57f0fb>This buff does not have a Deployment Limit</color>, which means that it will be effective even when the companion is not on-field.
Recruiting the same companion multiple times will increase the companion's Star.
Tap to activate a <color=#57f0fb>Node Event</color> to speed up your adventure progress.
There is a chance to receive an <color=#57f0fb>Artifact</color> after completing a Node Event. Artifacts provide special buffs and the more you carry the more benefits you will gain on your journey.
After your journey ends, claim your <color=#57f0fb>mission rewards</color> here.
Any <color=#57f0fb>Downfall Crystals</color> you obtained on your journey and from missions can be used to <color=#57f0fb>increase progress level</color> and claim handsome rewards.

Consume <color=#57f0fb>Curse-Dispelling Chapters</color> you received at the end of your journey to activate certain abilities. These abilities will provide you with <color=#57f0fb>extra bonuses</color> during your next journey.

Name: Dulcinea

Name: Dulcinea
Content: Now, let me explain how to increase an Art Exhibition's level.

Name: Dulcinea

Name: Dulcinea

Content: <color=#57f0fb>When the Masters of all 3 Schools reach Lv.6</color>, Mechanical Art will spread all across Constellia! <color=#57f0fb>Challenge failed</color>!

Name: Dulcinea
Content: Achieve victory when the Art Exhibitions of all 3 colors reach Lv.6!

Name: Dulcinea

Name: Dulcinea
Content: You have enough Green Paint. Go <color=#57f0fb>increase the level of the Art Exhibition</color>.

Name: Dulcinea
Content: Increase the Art Exhibition's level again to <color=#57f0fb>enhance Art Criticism</color>!

Name: Dulcinea
Content: Point out their <color=#57f0fb>fatal flaws</color>! <color=#57f0fb>Lower</color> the Master's level <color=#57f0fb>to Lv.1</color>!

Name: Dulcinea
Content: Having taken care of the Red and Green Masters, let's look at the Blue Master next.

Content: Tap here to go to the Blue Area and prepare for battle.

Name: Dulcinea
Content: Make sure to <color=#57f0fb>confirm the Masters' levels again</color> before the round ends to <color=#57f0fb>avoid accidental failure</color>.

Content: Let's try to equip a <color=#57f0fb>module</color> first.

Name: Trailblazer
Content: Different modules correspond to <color=#57f0fb>different combat styles</color>. Focus Logic is a module that focuses on single-weapon fighting. Tap it.

Name: Trailblazer
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Activate Module</color>.

Name: Trailblazer
Content: You can connect the skills of the module to a circuit after activating it, granting the skills <color=#57f0fb>extra effects</color>.

Name: Trailblazer
Content: Tap Confirm to occupy a port and connect to a circuit.

Name: Trailblazer
Content: Circuit connected. Each connected circuit will occupy a port, and there is a limited number of ports. Now, perform modifications yourself!

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>equip the current character with 1 unlocked Super Core</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: Switch the <color=#57f0fb>map</color> of this battle here.

Name: Celica
Content: You can preview the scene here. <color=#57f0fb>Different scenes may provide different effects</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can add other <color=#57f0fb>members</color> to join the current battle here.

Name: Celica
Content: You can select the opponents of this battle here. <color=#57f0fb>If left unselected, your opponents will be randomized</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Before the battle starts, you can tap <color=#57f0fb>Member Preparation</color> to equip your characters with <color=#57f0fb>Super Core</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Select this scene first.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Ultimate Brawl</color>, Commandant. You can tap to unlock a <color=#57f0fb>new Division.</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Here are the <color=#57f0fb>rules</color> of the new Division.

Name: Celica
Content: When a Division becomes available, <color=#57f0fb>a new Super Core will unlock</color>. Each character can <color=#57f0fb>have 1 Super Core equipped and obtain its powerful skills.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: On each day, you can claim one <color=#57f0fb>Supply</color> from Babylonia to level up your team.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's learn about Classical Showdown first.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Emergency Dispatch</color> is unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: In Emergency Dispatch, a Support Unit can be sent into the battle together with the Constructs deployed.

Name: Celica
Content: You can select your <color=#57f0fb>Support Unit</color> from the provided support characters.

Name: Celica
Content: Different units have different <color=#57f0fb>Assist Skills</color>. They will be triggered once you tap the portrait of the Support Unit in battle.

Name: Celica
Content: In Emergency Dispatch, a Support Unit can be sent into the battle together with the Constructs deployed.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Corrupted Battlefront</color>, Commandant. New stages are available for you to challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to enter the chapter and challenge the stages.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the icon of a stage to view details.

Name: Celica
Content: Advance to the stage now.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the details of the character's <color=#57f0fb>Mind Talents</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the Mind Talent and activate it.

Name: Celica
Content: Here is a summary of all the <color=#57f0fb>activated</color> Talents.

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>reallocate</color> the character's Mind Talents here.

Name: Celica
Content: You may switch to other members and view their Mind Talents here.

Name: Celica
Content: Limited daily stages will be reset at 7:00 (UTC). in the newly unlocked chapters.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete the stages to get corresponding rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Anchor Realm</color>. It's an all-new special operation.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's learn about the special features before starting the battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Equip a <color=#57f0fb>Support Chip</color> to get bonus abilities.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to select the Support Chip.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's start the battle!

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, the operation to eliminate Abnormal Data is now available.

Name: Celica
Content: Select the chapter on the left.

Name: Celica
Content: Here are the stage tips and rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Join other commandants once you are ready!

Name: Lucia
Content: Welcome to Cooking Lulu, Commandant! Here we'll <color=#57f0fb>cook together and serve our best dishes to the customers</color>!

Name: Lucia
Content: Let's start with <color=#57f0fb>cooking</color>. Tap the Cooking Station.

Name: Lucia
Content: Select the <color=#57f0fb>Dish</color> to cook.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Assign your <color=#57f0fb>Staff</color> to cook.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> again to start cooking.

Name: Lucia
Content: Great, the dish is being cooked. I'd also like to cook a dish for you when you have time.

Name: Lucia
Content: There is a staff working here. You've learned how to assign staff to cook, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: We are running out of Ingredients, Commandant. Please go to the <color=#57f0fb>Prep Station</color> and assign the work.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap the Prep Station to <color=#57f0fb>prepare Ingredients</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Assign your <color=#57f0fb>Staff</color> to prepare Ingredients.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> again to start working.

Name: Lucia
Content: Select the <color=#57f0fb>Ingredient</color> to process.

Name: Lucia
Content: There is a staff working here. You've learned how to assign staff to prepare ingredients, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: It's about time. Let's go to the <color=#57f0fb>Service Area</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Let's start <color=#57f0fb>serving customers</color>. Tap the Service Area.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: We are short of staff at the moment. Assign Lucia to serve the customers.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> again to start serving.

Name: Lucia
Content: Select the <color=#57f0fb>Dish</color> to sell.

Name: Lucia
Content: Move to the <color=#57f0fb>Service Area</color> to assign the work.

Name: Lucia
Content: Don't forget to check the <color=#57f0fb>Counter</color> later. You will need to <color=#57f0fb>manually collect</color> the revenue.

Name: Lucia
Content: Refer to the image guide for more details.

Name: Lucia
Content: It's about time. Let's go to the <color=#57f0fb>Service Area</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: There is a staff working here. You've learned how to assign staff to sell dishes, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: The staff have their own skills. You can upgrade them to speed up their work. There are some exceptions... Which I will not cover here.

Name: Lucia
Content: Use <color=#57f0fb>Lulu's Hearty Bowl</color> to hire/level up your Staff.

Name: Lucia
Content: The restaurant has a <color=#57f0fb>staff limit</color>. You can <color=#57f0fb>upgrade the restaurant</color> to increase this limit.

Name: Celica
Content: You can now select different enemies to challenge in Emergency Dispatch.

Name: Celica
Content: You need more practice to challenge the mighty enemies. Choose an easy enemy first.

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, this is the menu of <color=#57f0fb>Hot Dishes</color>. These Hot Dishes refresh every day. Selling them will earn you <color=#57f0fb>more revenue</color>!

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, you can upgrade the restaurant to unlock more effects. Each time you upgrade the restaurant, the <color=#57f0fb>decorations will also be renovated</color>!

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap the <color=#57f0fb>Level tag</color> to view the next level's effect.

Name: Lucia
Content: Once you've met the upgrade conditions, you can upgrade the restaurant with <color=#57f0fb>Lulu's Hearty Bowl</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: I heard about a restaurant so gorgeous that even Ayla was totally amazed. Let's make our own restaurant that will wow Ayla just as much!

Name: Celica
Content: Once you have a chip, go to <color=#57f0fb>Chip Group</color> to edit it.

Name: Celica
Content: Each Chip Group has <color=#57f0fb>1</color> Main Chip slot and <color=#57f0fb>8</color> Secondary Chip slots. Main/Secondary Chips can only be installed in the corresponding slots.

Name: Celica
Content: Select a Main Chip.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Equip.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the Main Chip slot.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the Chip Group button.

Name: Celica
Content: One Chip can be equipped in multiple Chip Groups. Each character can switch between different Chip Groups. Simply tap on a Chip Group to use it.

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the image guide for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>In each battle, you will deal certain DMG to the enemy. The remaining HP of the enemy in the zone is displayed here. Once the enemy is completely eliminated, you can proceed to the next zone.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Before arriving at the Combat Zone, you need to spend the required amount of supplies to proceed.

Name: Celica
Content: After arriving at the combat zone, consume supplies to join the battle. The faster you can clear the stage, the higher your damage will be.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>This is the Resource Security Area. When attacking a Danger Zone, you must also pay attention to your Resource Security Area and protect it.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Tap an adjacent Danger Zone to move forward.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>In each battle, you will deal certain DMG to the enemy. The remaining HP of the enemy in the zone is displayed here. Once the enemy is completely eliminated, you can proceed to the next zone.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: To attack a Danger Zone, you need to select another entrance.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38><color=#57f0fb>Guild Expedition</color> has officially started! This operation consists of <color=#57f0fb>3 rounds of battle</color>. Commandants who have only joined the Command Bureau during a particular round cannot participate in this round.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: <size=38>At the start of each round, the <color=#57f0fb>leader</color> will choose a difficulty level. The required <color=#57f0fb>member BP</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Activity</color> will increase as the difficulty increases, so make your decision carefully. If unselected, a <color=#57f0fb>difficulty level will be automatically selected</color> at <color=#57f0fb>23:00</color>.</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view the <color=#57f0fb>map layout</color> of the corresponding difficulty.

Name: Celica
Content: Chaos Sage and Yellow-eyed Shielder are guarding the the Dangerous Cliff. <color=#57f0fb>A combined Boss will appear when either one of them is defeated!</color>

Name: Celica
Content: The lower HP the two nodes have they combine, the lower HP the combined Boss will have. <color=#57f0fb>Try to finish off both nodes at the same time.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: When the two guardians combine, they will launch the combine skill. If they are still not defeated after the countdown, their HP will recover!

Name: Celica
Content: The sage and shielder have merged into an Iron Tango! Defeat it ASAP to prevent their HP from recovering.

Name: Celica
Content: The combine skill is active. Defeat the Boss within the time limit!

Name: Celica
Content: A new hidden node has been added! Earn Command Bureau points based on the damaged dealt within 60s.

Name: Celica
Content: There are 3 stages within the node. <color=#57f0fb>The challenging members are locked</color> in each stage. Within a single stage, <color=#57f0fb>you can only use Support Construct 2 times.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view the enemies and mechanism that will appear in the stage, and <color=#57f0fb>adjust your team accordingly.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: After getting a satisfactory score, you may upload the stage record. <color=#57f0fb>Only the score that sets a new record can be uploaded.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to enter battle.
<color=#57f0fb>Journal of Reversing Tides</color> has unlocked. Tap to check out the new content!
Read the criteria on the left and complete them.
You will receive special rewards after meeting a certain number of criteria.
Finally, you can sense the <color=#FF0000>Crimson Insight</color>... Let me tell your its <color=#FF0000>secret</color>...

Crimson Insight will bring you closer to reality... You will get <color=#FF0000>more Artifacts</color>... But it comes at a cost. The <color=#FF0000>enemies you sense will also become stronger</color>...
Here is the effect of the Insight. Once you have sensed it, <color=#FF0000>it will always stay with you</color>... <color=#FF0000>Until you awake again...</color>
Tap here to view the <color=#FF0000>influence of the Insight</color>. During the adventure, certain encounters will increase your Insight and amplify the influence.

Name: Ayla
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Looking Glass Vows</color>, Commandant. You can enter the exhibition here!

Name: Ayla
Content: You can choose the <color=#57f0fb>companion</color> entering the Looking Glass with you here!

Name: Ayla
Content: Remember that every entry into the Looking Glass costs you <color=#57f0fb>1 Looking Glass Pass</color>!

Name: Ayla
Content: Hm... There's also the <color=#57f0fb>Quick Clear</color> function. Tap the exclamation mark to view more details! Have a good time, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: In <color=#57f0fb>Mycenaean Protocol: Leaf-Ferried Dreams</color>, you can choose from multiple members modifiable with Specialties to complete a series of challenges.

Name: Celica
Content: Claim <color=#57f0fb>Daily Supply</color> to gain Team Merit. Team Merits gained from supplies and battles can increase your <color=#57f0fb>Team Level</color>, so don't forget to claim it!

Name: Celica
Content: Upgrading the Team Level will increase all frames' Battle Power and earn you <color=#57f0fb>Specialty Points</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: Use the <color=#57f0fb>Specialty Points</color> gained from upgrading Team Levels to modify the frames. Check it out!

Name: Celica
Content: You can choose and switch a frame's Specialty Path here! Feel free to switch things around if you run into trouble.

Name: Celica
Content: <size=34><color=#57f0fb>Specialty Path can be swapped and reset anytime</color>. Each frame comes with 2 Specialty Paths of different styles. Explore the freedom to develop the potential of your frames!</size>

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: You will need to complete the stages in reverse order during the Upstream Phase.

Name: Celica
Content: Each stage is made up of enemies you <color=#57f0fb>didn't fight</color> in the corresponding stage previously.

Name: Celica
Content: The stage results will affect the current chapter score during the Upstream Phase.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Inner World</color>. This operation has a total of <color=#57f0fb>five chapters</color> that will be unlocked based on progress over time.

Name: Celica
Content: Each chapter has <color=#57f0fb>two phases</color>. Complete the Downstream Phase to enter the Upstream Phase.

Name: Celica
Content: You need to complete a series of consecutive stages in each chapter. Each stage includes <color=#57f0fb>two</color> individual battles.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose one battle to fight and save the other battle for the next phase.

Name: Celica
Content: Each group of enemies has a weakness type. Tap here to view the details.

Name: Celica
Content: In Traits Overview, you can view the traits of the stages in this chapter.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Pathfinder</color>. In this operation, you have to control your characters to solve the puzzles and complete your missions.

Name: Celica
Content: Please select an operation stage first. I'll explain the rules after you enter the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: There is a mandatory character you must use in each stage. All puzzles will be solved by the characters and their shadows!

Name: Celica
Content: If you're ready, let's enter the stage and check it out!

Name: Celica
Content: This is the character you're controlling.

Name: Celica
Content: Swipe the screen to move your character until the Construct hits an obstacle.

Name: Celica
Content: This is your destination, which is closed now. You can pass through it before it opens.

Name: Celica
Content: The Kuroro with a mark is the <color=#57f0fb>key</color> to clearing the stage. Once you hit it, it will be destroyed and your destination will open.

Name: Celica
Content: This is the character's shadow. It will move in the same direction as the original character.

Name: Celica
Content: In the new chapters, the original character and the shadow character will be equipped with different special skills.

Name: Celica
Content: Corresponding skills have different effects in the stages. Check the skills illustrations for more details.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Circuit Connect: Predators Game</color>! Ping orbs to deal damage to the Boss. The more you ping, the higher your score.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose a Boss and enter Battle Preparations.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Change Character to swap the deployed character. Earn <color=#57f0fb>Signal Anchor</color> by completing event missions to purchase more characters from the event shop.

Name: Celica
Content: Each character has a special <color=#57f0fb>Finishing Move</color>. Activating it at the right time will yield the most benefits.

Name: Celica
Content: On top of that, the Signal Orb skills of each character have different <color=#57f0fb>Damage Coefficients</color>. Choose the right character based on the Boss' weaknesses.

Name: Celica
Content: Enter the next step of Battle Preparations.

Name: Celica
Content: Each character can equip up to 3 <color=#57f0fb>secondary skills</color>. Earn <color=#57f0fb>Signal Diffuser</color> by completing daily missions to purchase more secondary skills from the event shop.

Name: Celica
Content: For more details, please check out the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap View Details to view the skills of the corresponding Boss. You can strategize based on the Boss' <color=#57f0fb>skill features</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap two <color=#57f0fb>adjacent Signal Orbs</color> to swap them. When three or more Signal Orbs are aligned, they will be cleared.

Name: Celica
Content: The combo from clearing Signal Orbs is converted into <color=#57f0fb>Finishing Move Energy</color>. You can activate the character's Finishing Move after accumulating enough Finishing Move Energy. It will enter cooldown upon activation.

Name: Celica
Content: Pay attention to here! The round ends when <color=#57f0fb>the number of remaining Turns is 0</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can view the <color=#57f0fb>Buff effects</color> of the Boss and <color=#57f0fb>the countdown until the next skill</color> the Boss will cast here.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Special Challenge</color> is now available! Tap here to begin the challenge, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: In this Special Challenge, Shark-speare's movement unit is <color=#57f0fb>Time</color>. You can <color=#57f0fb>move freely</color> within the stage's time limit.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to view the Boss' details.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Nemesis Brawl</color>, Commandant. New stages are available for you to challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to enter and challenge the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: You will gain unique Support Units in this event, Commandant. Tap <color=#57f0fb>Chapter Instruction</color> to view the <color=#57f0fb>Support Unit</color> unlocked by the current chapter.

Name: Celica
Content: There are 4 chapters in this event. Let's enter <color=#57f0fb>Storm Hunting Ground</color> first.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to assign the Support Unit to your team.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to assign M4-Medic Bot to your team.

Name: Celica
Content: Next, we'll select a character.

Name: Celica
Content: Feral has a Bond with M4-Medic Bot. Assigning both of them will trigger a powerful effect.

Name: Celica
Content: Equipping Support Units consumes Load. Tap here to view how much Load the corresponding unit costs.

Name: Celica
Content: Assign Feral to your team.

Name: Celica
Content: You're ready now. Let's fight!

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the <color=#57f0fb>Active Skills and Passive Effects</color> of the corresponding Support Unit.

Name: Celica
Content: When a Support Unit is on the battlefield with its <color=#57f0fb>Bonded character</color>, its <color=#57f0fb>Bond Skill</color> will be activated.

Name: No. 21
Content: Welcome to my <color=#57f0fb>Space Odyssey</color>! As this story's protagonist, it is my responsibility to introduce its content to you, dear readers.

Name: No. 21
Content: Start the journey with me.

Name: No. 21
Content: This is my Star Chart. Planets will light up after I visit them.

Name: No. 21
Content: Let's head to the first planet. This is where the wolf cub's journey begins.

Name: No. 21
Content: Each planet has different areas. Let's start with the first one.

Name: No. 21
Content: Each planet has several <color=#57f0fb>Sovereigns</color>. The wolf cub can only continue after defeating them.

Name: No. 21
Content: I can have my own Exploration Team. Tap here to assign the members. There can be <color=#57f0fb>3 members</color> at most.

Name: No. 21
Content: You can configure the <color=#57f0fb>buildings you</color> bring to the planet here. These facilities are crucial to defeating the Sovereigns.

Name: No. 21
Content: Time to go!

Name: No. 21
Content: ...The planet's <color=#57f0fb>environment</color> has changed. Be careful. I can smell that there's something different.

Name: No. 21
Content: Let's go to the next area.

Name: No. 21
Content: This is my <color=#57f0fb>Province</color>.

Name: No. 21
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Place buildings</color> in the Province to gain more <color=#57f0fb>Buffs</color> during exploration. Modifying the Province will make me stronger.

Name: No. 21
Content: Completing the Sovereign's challenge will earn you <color=#57f0fb>Star Tokens</color>, which you can use to construct buildings in the Province. Each building constructed will provide more Buffs during exploration.

Name: No. 21
Content: Even weather can be changed freely in my Province.

Name: No. 21
Content: Let's construct this building first.

Name: No. 21
Content: Some terrains will activate <color=#57f0fb>special effects</color> when they are <color=#57f0fb>neighboring</color> specific buildings.

Name: No. 21
Content: Construct another building. Now, we're prepared for our journey ahead.

Name: No. 21
Content: I will gain <color=#57f0fb>planet-specific</color> <color=#57f0fb>terrain blueprints</color> on each planet.

Name: No. 21
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Drag</color> the terrain blueprint to the specific location.

Name: No. 21
Content: There will be enemies trying to stop me on the road, and we'll enter a fight when we encounter them. We can only move forward after we <color=#57f0fb>defeat them</color>.

Name: No. 21
Content: Some buildings will also activate special effects when they are <color=#57f0fb>neighboring</color> each other. Check the <color=#57f0fb>Activation Marks</color> on the effects to confirm.

Name: No. 21
Content: A member is injured! That won't do...! Place the <color=#57f0fb>"Dawnlight" Bar</color> next to the Training Field to restore HP to allies.

Name: No. 21
Content: You will gain <color=#57f0fb>Star Ore</color> when you pass by the <color=#57f0fb>Norman Star Mine</color>. You can use them to construct new buildings.

Name: No. 21
Content: I need to become stronger to defeat the Sovereigns. Tap here to build a <color=#57f0fb>Star Training Field</color> to <color=#57f0fb>improve the stats</color> of the team.

Name: No. 21
Content: ...I'll tell you what to do next.

Name: No. 21
Content: I will be traveling around the planet. Each cycle made will update the planet's <color=#57f0fb>progress</color>. The <color=#57f0fb>number or cycles</color> made is recorded here.

Name: No. 21
Content: This is the <color=#57f0fb>Sovereign's</color> <color=#57f0fb>arrival progress</color>, which increases as the number of cycles increases. When the progress bar is complete, the Sovereign will appear at the <color=#57f0fb>beginning</color> of the stage.

Name: No. 21
Content: View the <color=#57f0fb>Sovereign's</color> power, stats, and arrival time here. If your team reaches the recommended power, you can <color=#57f0fb>summon</color> the Sovereign.

Name: No. 21
Content: You can view your team's power here.

Name: No. 21
Content: Beware of the members' status. They will be forced to return if they have insufficient <color=#57f0fb>HP</color>. The <color=#57f0fb>journey ends</color> when all members are gone.

Name: No. 21
Content: This is a <color=#57f0fb>building blueprint</color>. Place the building on an <color=#57f0fb>empty tile</color> to complete the construction. Some blueprints have <color=#57f0fb>quantity limits</color>.

Name: No. 21
Content: Tap the building blueprint or the building model on the planet to view the <color=#57f0fb>details of its effects</color>.

Name: No. 21
Content: The effects of different buildings are displayed here. You can inspect the information on the different buildings before you begin construction.

Name: No. 21
Content: Tap the <color=#57f0fb>building blueprint</color> to see how to drag and construct a building.

Name: No. 21
Content: Prioritize constructing the<color=#57f0fb> recommended buildings</color> here if you're not sure which buildings are suitable for the planet you are on.

Name: No. 21
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Start</color> to begin <color=#57f0fb>traveling around the planet</color>, and tap again to stop. Alright, let's go!

Name: No. 21
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Slide the screen with two fingers</color> to adjust your field of view so that you have a better grasp of the situation.

Name: No. 21
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>weather</color> on this planet... is different from the last. Tap here to view the <color=#57f0fb>weather effect</color>.

Name: No. 21
Content: Planets have different <color=#57f0fb>weather effects</color>. Weather also changes as the <color=#57f0fb>number of cycles</color> changes.

Name: No. 21
Content: The head of the Observatory seems to have left a gift behind.

Name: No. 21
Content: Tap the icon to view the <color=#57f0fb>item effect</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Drag</color> it to use it.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>The Meandering Three</color>! This operation will see Noctis leading a squad on a special adventure.

Name: Celica
Content: Before entering the battle, let's learn about the <color=#57f0fb>Synergy Switch</color> system, the new squad-exclusive Bond. Tap here for more details.

Name: Celica
Content: We have a new feature, <color=#57f0fb>Synergy Switch</color>, added to this operation. Trigger it at the right moment to summon your teammate's aid!

Name: Celica
Content: The different Cerberus members will trigger different effects as well. Tap here to view the skills of each member.

Name: Celica
Content: Learn about Cerberus' adventure in <color=#57f0fb>Wanderer Record</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Wild Waste</color> is now available. Challenge different Bosses in this mode!

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Fenrir to enter the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Limit Break</color>. In this operation, you will challenge yourself with a challenge stage you customize yourself.

Name: Celica
Content: Beware of the Theme Effects and the Special Target of each stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Customize the difficulty of the stage to increase the <color=#57f0fb>Current Pressure</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Selecting an enemy will add the corresponding Pressure. You can also choose to add Affixes.

Name: Celica
Content: Gain Event Points when Pressure meets the Special Target. Use them to redeem <color=#57f0fb>rewards</color> in this event.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's start building this challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Hard Mode</color> will be unlocked when the stage is cleared with <color=#57f0fb>2 Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can choose <color=#57f0fb>harder</color> enemies and Affixes in Hard Mode and earn <color=#57f0fb>more Points</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Devour Wave Escape: Tides of Time</color>. There are 6 chapters in this challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to enter Chapter 1.

Name: Celica
Content: Read the <color=#57f0fb>Stage Mechanics</color> here carefully. Different mechanics will appear in the stages to come. Adapt and <color=#57f0fb>make use of these mechanics</color> to clear the stage!

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to enter the chapter and begin the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: You can find <color=#57f0fb>Strategy Nodes</color> on some floors. Different Strategy Nodes provide different types of <color=#57f0fb>Buffs</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose <color=#57f0fb>1 Strategy from 3</color> here. Choosing the right Strategy will help you sail through the challenge!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>6★ Weapons</color> can be Harmonized. Select a weapon first.

Name: Celica
Content: Increase Harmony Level to unlock <color=#57f0fb>Harmony Absorption</color>. Select a <color=#57f0fb>Memory Set</color> to increase <color=#57f0fb>the piece count for Memory Set effects by 2</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to check available <color=#57f0fb>Memory Sets</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The materials required for Harmony can be obtained in <color=#57f0fb>Clash Reflection</color>. Tap <color=#57f0fb>Harmony</color> to increase Harmony Level.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>6★ Weapons</color> can be Harmonized. Select a weapon first.

Name: Celica
Content: Increase Harmony Level to unlock <color=#57f0fb>Harmony Absorption</color>. Select a <color=#57f0fb>Memory Set</color> to increase <color=#57f0fb>the piece count for Memory Set effects by 2</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to check available <color=#57f0fb>Memory Sets</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The materials required for Harmony can be obtained in <color=#57f0fb>Clash Reflection</color>. Tap <color=#57f0fb>Harmony</color> to increase Harmony Level.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Into the Deep</color>, Commandant. In this mode, you will challenge new stages and face a large number of enemies.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap an Add-on to view the <color=#57f0fb>Add-on effects</color> of different levels and the number of items required to <color=#57f0fb>unlock and upgrade the Add-on</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: First, let's take a look at the <color=#57f0fb>Add-on Edit function</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view the <color=#57f0fb>equipped Add-ons</color> and remaining <color=#57f0fb>Add-on slots</color> available.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Data Turbulence</color> will refresh at the latest chapter <color=#57f0fb>everyday</color>. It can be challenged <color=#57f0fb>once</color> per day.

Name: Celica
Content: You can clear Data Turbulence stages once you have met their requirements. When you clear a Data Turbulence stage for the first time, you will get <color=#57f0fb>Song Fragment</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: This event consists of Data Turbulence and Regular Challenge stages. In these stages, you may only use <color=#57f0fb>1 character</color>, and <color=#57f0fb>DMG Numbers</color> will not be displayed.

Name: Celica
Content: Regular stages come with <color=#57f0fb>3★</color> requirements. Meet these conditions to earn the corresponding rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Once the requirements are met, you can claim <color=#57f0fb>event rewards and Song Fragments</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: Accumulate more stars to get the <color=#57f0fb>star rewards</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Special Dispatch - Sand Table Simulation</color>. In this operation, you will fight alongside all commandants in the server to clear the blocks and increase the operation progress.

Name: Celica
Content: The operation map consists of several blocks. Once the Contribution of a block has met the requirement, it will be cleared, and <color=#57f0fb>adjacent blocks</color> will be unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: For more contents, please check out the Image Guide.

Name: Celica
Content: Clear different types of blocks to earn different <color=#57f0fb>server rewards</color> to further assist you in this operation.

Name: Celica
Content: In addition, you can also get <color=#57f0fb>Trial Prototypes</color> from daily block battles and completing event missions, and exchange them for awesome rewards in <color=#57f0fb>Special Supplies</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Once a block has reached 100% progress, it will be cleared. You will then receive the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>server reward</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can participate in the battle by consuming Floating Computing Power. <color=#57f0fb>The higher the rating</color> you earn in a stage, <color=#57f0fb>the better the rewards</color> you will get.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandants who choose to dispatch <color=#57f0fb>do not need to actually take part in the battle</color>. They can simply consume Floating Computing Power to earn <color=#57f0fb>fixed rewards</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: After clearing a <color=#57f0fb>Character Block</color>, you will receive the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>Special Character and Character Combat Amplification</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Unlock and collect more Special Characters to earn bonus <color=#57f0fb>Trial Prototypes</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Clear an <color=#57f0fb>Amplification block</color> to receive its Amplification Sequences, which can increase the <color=#57f0fb>Amplification Level</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Increase the Amplification Level to provide the entire team with a <color=#57f0fb>basic stat bonus</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You will also unlock special <color=#57f0fb>stage buffs</color>, which will assist you in the stages of subsequent blocks.

Name: Celica
Content: A certain amount of Trial Prototypes will be produced in <color=#57f0fb>Phase Results</color>. This amount <color=#57f0fb>will increase over time</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: As you clear the Dark blocks of the four areas, tokens will be produced at a higher <color=#57f0fb>rate</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Clash Reflection</color>. Each phase of this event will last 14 days.

Name: Celica
Content: The system will allocate commandants to different zones based on their Commandant Levels.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap "To Battle".

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>enemies</color> you will face in the current battle are shown here.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view the affixes of the enemies in the battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Once you have formed a team and started the challenge, <color=#57f0fb>you cannot change the team configuration</color>. The team's <color=#57f0fb>HP and Signature Energy</color> in every battle will carry over to the next one.

Name: Celica
Content: In this mode, you may <color=#57f0fb>manually reset a stage</color>. After the total Operators you have earned are <color=#57f0fb>calculated</color>, the stage will be restored to its <color=#57f0fb>initial state</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: After a stage is reset, you can <color=#57f0fb>still earn Operators</color> when challenging it again.

Name: Celica
Content: You can claim rewards based on the <color=#57f0fb>total Operators</color> earned after stages. <color=#57f0fb>The rewards will also refresh when the event is reset</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Each set of stages comes with their unique <color=#57f0fb>achievement rewards</color> that can be claimed once you have completed them. <color=#57f0fb>Achievement rewards cannot be reset</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Now is the time for <color=#57f0fb>Repeated Simulation</color>. You can still use Computing Power to take part in the battle, but no block Contribution will be earned.

Name: Celica
Content: In Repeated Simulations, you will earn <color=#57f0fb>a fixed amount of</color> Trial Prototypes at the end of battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Lingering Stars</color>. Tap <color=#57f0fb>New Game</color> to start the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, you need to guess whether the next card is <color=#57f0fb>greater</color> or <color=#57f0fb>smaller</color> than the target card on the right.

Name: Celica
Content: After every <color=#57f0fb>3 guesses</color>, you will receive <color=#57f0fb>1 Tip</color>. Use the Tip to reveal whether the next card is greater or smaller.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete the event mission to get <color=#57f0fb>Moonlit Coins</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Give Moonlit Coins to characters in Character Story to unlock their <color=#57f0fb>exclusive stories</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: I know you are confused, but there is no <color=#57f0fb>time</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: You must start a <color=#57f0fb>simulation</color> immediately.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Choose the simulation difficulty based on your abilities. The higher the difficulty, the better the rewards.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Let's start from easy.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Members deployed in simulation</color> will earn <color=#57f0fb>Reprint EXP</color>, which can increase their Reprint Levels.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Use <color=#57f0fb>Modems</color> in Potential Alternatives to activate abilities that provide buffs during simulation.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Modems</color> can be earned by increasing character's Advance Levels. The total number of Modems that can be earned differs between characters.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Modems</color> are required to activate the nodes of <color=#57f0fb>Potential Alternatives</color>. Once activated, they will provide various buffs in the subsequent simulation.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Here are the goals of simulation. Complete them to earn <color=#57f0fb>Data Storage Units</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Data Storage Units</color> can increase <color=#57f0fb>Illusory Anecdotes</color> Level, unlocking corresponding rewards.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: This is <color=#57f0fb>Sharksco</color>. You can exchange precious <color=#57f0fb>Processing Units</color> for items here.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: You have got a <color=#57f0fb>Artifact</color>. Artifact provide various bonuses in simulation, and these bonuses apply <color=#57f0fb>to all members in the team</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Choose them based on the needs of your team members.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: You have received more <color=#57f0fb>Recruit Energy</color>, which can be used to recruit more characters.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Use Recruit Energy to replace your existing members with <color=#57f0fb>other members</color> of higher costs, or simply recruit <color=#57f0fb>more members</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: If you still have Recruit Energy left, you can select empty slots to <color=#57f0fb>recruit more members</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: I almost forgot! Here you can <color=#57f0fb>adjust the leader and positions of the team to deploy</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: You can now choose a piece of <color=#57f0fb>equipment</color>. Once equipped, it provides the character with many powerful bonuses.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Each piece of equipment belongs to a <color=#57f0fb>set</color>. When you have collected <color=#57f0fb>all</color> equipment of the same set, you will also get <color=#57f0fb>set bonuses</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Each character has a limit on the <color=#57f0fb>number of sets</color> they can equip. Note that single pieces of equipment from the same set are not subject to this limit. Choose wisely.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: You need more members to help complete the simulation. Recruit more members.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Start the simulation</color> after you have recruited more members.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Here you can view the <color=#57f0fb>equipment details</color> of the current member. What's equipment? You will find out soon.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Tap here to trigger <color=#57f0fb>Node Event</color>, pushing forward the simulation progress.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Recruit Energy</color> is required to recruit members. Different members will consume different levels of <color=#57f0fb>Recruit Energy</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Recruit Energy</color> has a limit. You will earn it during simulation.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: During simulation, you can <color=#57f0fb>change the recruited members anytime</color>. When a member leaves, <color=#57f0fb>all</color> Recruit Energy used will be refunded. Select a member first.

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, you can upgrade the restaurant to unlock more effects. Each time you upgrade the restaurant, the <color=#57f0fb>decorations will also be renovated</color>!

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap the <color=#57f0fb>Level tag</color> to view the next level's effect.

Name: Lucia
Content: Once you've met the upgrade conditions, you can upgrade the restaurant with <color=#57f0fb>Ice Cream Coin</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Popular dishes have a higher selling price than the base price. <color=#57f0fb>Sell the daily popular dish</color> to get more <color=#57f0fb>Ice Cream Coins</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Each Staff has their own skills. <color=#57f0fb>Level up the Staff</color> to <color=#57f0fb>reduce their production time/increase the selling price</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Use <color=#57f0fb>Ice Cream Coin</color> to hire/level up your Staff.

Name: Lucia
Content: The restaurant has a <color=#57f0fb>staff limit</color>. You can <color=#57f0fb>upgrade the restaurant</color> to increase this limit.

Name: Lucia
Content: It's about time. Let's go to the <color=#57f0fb>Service Area</color>.

Name: Lucia
