Content: Get ready to <color=#57f0fb>server customers</color>. Tap the Service Area.

Name: Lucia
Content: Select the dish to sell. To earn more <color=#57f0fb>Ice Cream Coins</color>, you should choose the dishes with the <color=#57f0fb>Popular</color> tag first.

Name: Lucia
Content: Move to the <color=#57f0fb>Service Area</color> to assign the work.

Name: Lucia
Content: When the Ice Cream Coins stored in the cashier machine <color=#57f0fb>reach the limit</color>, the Service Area will stop functioning. Commandant, don't forget to <color=#57f0fb>collect</color> the income from the cashier manually.

Name: Lucia
Content: Refer to the image guide for more details.

Name: Lucia
Content: It's about time. Let's go to the <color=#57f0fb>Service Area</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: There is a staff working here. You've learned how to assign staff to sell dishes, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: Once a dish is sold, the Ice Cream Coins earned will be <color=#57f0fb>temporarily stored in the cashier machine</color>. I will show you how it works now.

Name: Lucia
Content: We are running out of ingredients and need to let our Staff <color=#57f0fb>prepare the ingredients</color>. Commandant, move to the <color=#57f0fb>Prep Station</color> and assign Staff.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap the Prep Station to <color=#57f0fb>prepare Ingredients</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Urgent</color> sign indicates that this ingredient will be fully <color=#57f0fb>consumed</color> in 6 hours. We should <color=#57f0fb>prioritize</color> [Urgent] ingredients.

Name: Lucia
Content: There is a staff working here. You've learned how to assign staff to prepare ingredients, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Ice Queen Lulu</color> is open. Come have a look, Commandant!

Name: Lucia
Content: Select the <color=#57f0fb>Dish</color> to cook.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Assign a suitable <color=#57f0fb>Staff</color> to cook.

Name: Lucia
Content: There is a staff working here. You've learned how to assign staff to cook, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Rest</color> to terminate all work, so you can change <color=#57f0fb>the restaurant staff layout</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Stop slacking, Commandant. We only just opened the stall! Let's make it great again.

Name: Lucia
Content: Let's start with <color=#57f0fb>cooking</color>. Tap the Cooking Station.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Culinary Delight</color> is a Staff skill bonus. Choose Staff with skill bonuses that apply on the current dish to increase the dish's production speed.

Name: Lucia
Content: Liv's great at cooking. Let's choose her.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> to assign this staff to the job.

Name: Lucia
Content: Confirm again, and she will start working!

Name: Lucia
Content: Let's start with <color=#57f0fb>cooking</color>. Tap the Cooking Station.

Name: Lucia
Content: Let's start with <color=#57f0fb>cooking</color>. Tap the Cooking Station.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Bonus</color> is unlocked. Carefully choose the bonuses for each area to significantly increase the restaurant's production speed and income.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here are <color=#57f0fb>the active bonuses and working Staff</color> of Prep Station.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Change Bonus</color> to open the list of bonuses.

Name: Lucia
Content: Different <color=#57f0fb>team combos</color> have additional <color=#57f0fb>bonuses</color> on <color=#57f0fb>certain ingredients/dishes</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here are the <color=#57f0fb>Staff that can benefit from</color> the current bonus. The valid bonus will also be displayed on <color=#57f0fb>Staff Selection Page</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here are the <color=#57f0fb>ingredients/dishes that can benefit from</color> the current bonus, as well as the <color=#57f0fb>bonus effects</color>. The bonus is active as long as the <color=#57f0fb>working Staff is a member of the current bonus team</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Upgrade the restaurant/use Ice Cream Coins</color> to unlock more bonuses.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here is a <color=#57f0fb>preview of the current bonus effect on different areas</color>. Choose the bonuses wisely so they can <color=#57f0fb>cover as many Staff as possible</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can assign a <color=#57f0fb>Support Character</color> to join the expedition. They will help the other players at the Command Bureau with the battle!

Name: Celica
Content: Select a support character suitable for this expedition and adjust their weapons and Memories on the support page.

Name: Celica
Content: After setting up your support characters, they will receive expedition loot according to their work time and number of deployments. Remember to claim it in time.

Name: Celica
Content: When the Boss is defeated, it will <color=#57f0fb>revive and level up</color>. You may challenge it again for more rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Break the Boss's Super Armor to enhance the entire team.

Name: Celica
Content: When the Boss reaches Lv.3, you can challenge it via <color=#57f0fb>Custom Mode</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: Refer to the image guide for more information.

Name: Celica
Content: Before joining the battle, you will need to consume relevant supplies to reach the combat zone.

Name: Celica
Content: After arriving at the combat zone, consume supplies to join the battle. The faster you can clear the stage, the higher your damage will be.

Name: Celica
Content: This is the Resource Security Area. When attacking a Danger Zone, you must also pay attention to your Resource Security Area and protect it.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap an adjacent Danger Zone to move forward.

Name: Celica
Content: In each battle, you will deal certain DMG to the enemy. The remaining HP of the enemy in the zone is displayed here. Once the enemy is completely eliminated, you can proceed to the next zone.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to return to the last level.

Name: Celica
Content: A new <color=#57f0fb>Cliff Fortress</color> node has been added to this operation. You must clear a stage first before challenging subsequent nodes. You will receive points based on the number of enemy waves defeated.

Name: Celica
Content: At the start of each round, the <color=#57f0fb>Leader</color> will select a difficulty. Keep in mind that the required <color=#57f0fb>member BP</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Activity</color> levels increase with difficulty.

Name: Celica
Content: If no difficulty is chosen, the system will <color=#57f0fb>automatically</color> select one for you.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to view <color=#57f0fb>map layout</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Guild Expedition</color> consists of <color=#57f0fb>3 rounds of battles</color>. Players must enter <color=#57f0fb>before the start of a round</color> to <color=#57f0fb>take part</color> in this round.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Guild Expedition</color> consists of <color=#57f0fb>3 rounds of battles</color>. Players must enter <color=#57f0fb>before the start of a round</color> to <color=#57f0fb>take part</color> in this round.

Name: Celica
Content: Evolve members to increase their combat power.

Name: Celica
Content: Select Lucia: Lotus.

Name: Celica
Content: The current Lotus frame is Rank B.

Name: Celica
Content: Select the <color=#57f0fb>Rank</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Each Rank consists of several <color=#57f0fb>phases</color>. You can expand them to view the <color=#57f0fb>effects</color> of each phase when they are activated.

Name: Celica
Content: Use the <color=#57f0fb>Inver-Shards</color> of a member to activate the phase effects. When all the phases are unlocked, the character will evolve to the next Rank.

Name: Celica
Content: You can collect more Inver-Shards for your members through <color=#57f0fb>Research</color> to further improve their rank.

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, I can feel a big improvement in my frame's performance. Let's test it out.

Name: Celica
Content: S-Rank Construct <color=#57f0fb>Lucia: Crimson Weave</color> unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: Claim all Phase 1 Mission rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Crimson Weave</color> frame obtained.

Name: Celica
Content: Next up, training time!

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, we have made some changes to the member system in this update.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can collapse and expand the member filter list. When expanded, it puts members into different categories based on Energy.

Name: Celica
Content: Member training has been divided. You can proceed directly to Evolve and Awaken from the main interface.

Name: Celica
Content: A collapsed list of tags has been added to the entrance of <color=#57f1fb>Memory</color>. You can tap to expand the tags anytime to view the details of Memories equipped by the member.

Name: Leonie
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Chessboard Realms</color>. This event is turn-based.

Name: Leonie
Content: Use BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER to take on the white pieces. You win when <color=#57f0fb>the White King is defeated</color>!

Name: Leonie
Content: When you finish a move, click on the attack icon to launch an attack.

Name: Leonie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Adjust attack location</color> by clicking on the blue zone.

Name: Leonie
Content: Click on<color=#57f0fb> the highlighted zone to move. Please be warned that if you </color>\nenter the red zone<color=#57f0fb>, you will be attacked by your opponent at the end of the turn</color>.

Name: Leonie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The Rock Cannon can deal more damage to the target's center point</color>. Adjust attack location to attack more units.

Name: Leonie
Content: Click "Confirm" to attack!

Name: Leonie
Content: Adjust your position to attack the white pieces from the side.

Name: Leonie
Content: Try to defeat the White King!

Name: Leonie
Content: In this stage, you will be taken through some basic information about the white pieces and strategies to cope with them.

Name: Leonie
Content: When the white side is moving a piece, you can check its range of movement and the time left for it to finish its move by clicking on the piece.

Name: Leonie
Content: The red zone is the area within which a white piece can move and attack. If <color=#57f0fb>BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is in the red zone when a round is over, she falls prey to the white side.</color>

Name: Leonie
Content: In the bottom right corner of the screen, you will see how many more rounds there are left until a piece can make a move. When <color=#57f0fb>you see the number become a movement icon, it means the piece is ready to make a move.</color>

Name: Leonie
Content: The White King is defeated. You have won again!

Name: Leonie
Content: New skill unlocked for BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER—Energy. You may check the remaining Energy in the bottom right corner of the screen.

Name: Leonie
Content: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER regains 1 Energy every time a new round starts. She regains 1 Energy, too, with every unit she eliminates.

Name: Leonie
Content: You now have 4 Energy. Click "Cast" to fire a Flash Shot!

Name: Leonie
Content: The center point of a Flash Shot can cause higher damage, while the splash damage can eliminate the Knights.

Name: Leonie
Content: Now, go on and finish the rest of the battle!

Name: Leonie
Content: When you feel overwhelmed by a match, you can switch to Top View to get a better view of the match!

Name: Leonie
Content: The White Bishops are now in the match!

Name: Leonie
Content: Click to read about their abilities and range of movement. The White Bishops should not be taken lightly.

Name: Leonie
Content: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER has unlocked a new skill. Spend 8 Energy to cast Full Burst!

Name: Leonie
Content: The center point of Full Burst can wipe out the Rook immediately, while the splash damage can eliminate the Bishops.

Name: Leonie
Content: Now, go on and finish the rest of the battle!

Name: Leonie
Content: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER has obtained the Black Blade. Cut down single enemies with it!

Name: Leonie
Content: Head toward the Bishops and cut them down!

Name: Leonie
Content: You earn an additional round if you successfully hit an enemy with the Black Blade.

Name: Leonie
Content: With the Black Blade, you are now more flexible and able to move further.

Name: Leonie
Content: You can eliminate the Bishops in one strike with the Black Blade. Attack them!

Name: Leonie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>An attack launched in an additional round is worth 3 points less than an attack launched in a regular round.</color> Proceed with the attack.

Name: Leonie
Content: Burning Heart is a buff skill. Once Burning Heart is cast, the DMG of this round will increase by 1. You will then be able to skip the pieces in the frontline to launch a direct attack at the pieces in the backline.

Name: Leonie
Content: Skip the white pieces and go straight for the White King with the Black Blade!

Name: Leonie
Content: The White Rook is now in the match!

Name: Leonie
Content: The Rook has an HP of 7 and moves either horizontally or vertically. A Flame Slash can wipe it out immediately.

Name: Leonie
Content: Watch out for the Pawns at the bottom line of the board.

Name: Leonie
Content: When a Pawn reaches the bottom line, it can be promoted to any chess piece other than the King. Pawns are not to be taken lightly!

Name: Leonie
Content: BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER has unlocked Flame Flash. Switch to it now and play with it!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Forever Racer</color>. In this event, your decisions will affect <color=#57f0fb>the challenge you will be facing in the ending stage</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: This event comes in two parts—Transdimensional Fissure and Imprisoned Self—and starts with <color=#57f0fb>Transdimensional Fissure</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: In Transdimensional Fissure, you will face scenes from different chapters. Click on the different tabs to enter different chapters.

Name: Celica
Content: Each chapter comes with several node stages. You will have to <color=#57f0fb>first clear these nodes</color> to reach the ending stage.

Name: Celica
Content: You need to select <color=#57f0fb>a node effect suitable for each node</color>. See node effects here.

Name: Celica
Content: You can select a node effect here. <color=#57f0fb>The node effect selected will become effective in the upcoming stage</color>. Choose your node effect wisely.

Name: Celica
Content: When you first enter a chapter, you will see<color=#57f0fb> all the effects unique to that chapter</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: When you have cleared a node, <color=#57f0fb>the effect you have earned from the node will continue to be effective until the ending stage is cleared.</color> Click here to see the node effect you earned from the ending stage.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The ending stage will be unlocked once all the nodes have been cleared, </color>making it possible for you to challenge the ending stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Alternatively, you may choose to reset your chapter progress and the node effects you have earned by clicking <color=#57f0fb>Chapter Reset</color>. For the nodes you have already cleared, you can skip them by clicking "Auto Clear".

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>To reset your progress for one single node</color>, click the node you wish to reset your progress for. This will allow you to select a node effect again.

Name: Leonie
Content: In Hard Game, <color=#57f0fb>some pieces come with an affix</color>.

Name: Leonie
Content: To see the effects of an affix, click the chess with an icon in the top right corner of the screen.

Name: Leonie
Content: Starting from this stage, the white pieces will call for <color=#57f0fb>Reinforcement</color>.

Name: Leonie
Content: The additional pieces summoned will be seen on the board once the countdown is over. These additional pieces are not to be taken lightly.

Name: Leonie
Content: The Bishops will be free from damage in this stage.

Name: Leonie
Content: Control your opponent with the Stun effect from Flash Shot and Full Burst!

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Brandishing Tunes</color>. This is a special party!

Name: Lucia
Content: We will be playing different songs as we go. Enjoy the games whenever you feel like it.

Name: Lucia
Content: Now, allow me to quickly bring you up to speed about the party!

Name: Lucia
Content: To play the games at this party, you will have to participate with the number of members each song specifies.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Special Challenge</color> is now available! Tap here to begin the challenge, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: In this Special Challenge, Shark-speare's movement unit is <color=#57f0fb>Time</color>. You can <color=#57f0fb>move freely</color> within the stage's time limit.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to view the Boss' details.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap two <color=#57f0fb>adjacent Signal Orbs</color> to swap them. When three or more Signal Orbs are aligned, they will be cleared.

Name: Celica
Content: The combo from clearing Signal Orbs is converted into <color=#57f0fb>Finishing Move Energy</color>. You can activate the character's Finishing Move after accumulating enough Finishing Move Energy. It will enter cooldown upon activation.

Name: Celica
Content: Pay attention to here! The round ends when <color=#57f0fb>the number of remaining Turns is 0</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can view the <color=#57f0fb>Buff effects</color> of the Boss and <color=#57f0fb>the countdown until the next skill</color> the Boss will cast here.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Circuit Connect: Twisted Constellations</color>! Ping orbs to deal damage to the Boss. The more you ping, the higher your score.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose a Boss and enter Battle Preparations.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Switch Character to change the character in battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can check the different <color=#57f0fb>skill effects</color> of characters.

Name: Celica
Content: Characters have different <color=#57f0fb>Energy Types</color>. They can deal bonus DMG when their Energy Type matches the Boss' Weakness Type.

Name: Celica
Content: Enter the next step of Battle Preparations.

Name: Celica
Content: Each character can equip up to 3 <color=#57f0fb>secondary skills</color>. Earn <color=#57f0fb>Signal Diffuser</color> by completing daily missions to purchase more secondary skills from the event shop.

Name: Celica
Content: For more details, please check out the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to view the corresponding Boss' details. You can choose appropriate strategies based on the Boss' <color=#57f0fb>features</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: When <color=#57f0fb>Serendipitous Snapshot</color> reaches 100%, tap it to generate <color=#57f0fb>special stages</color> in a zone.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete the battle in a zone to earn <color=#57f0fb>Gospel</color>. Once Gospel <color=#57f0fb>reaches the limit</color>, you can enter Gospel Snapshot stages.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The chance to get rare Add-On Units</color> is higher in Gospel Snapshot. Tap here to check the rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: You can consume the <color=#57f0fb>Memory Synapses</color> obtained from battles to amplify <color=#57f0fb>the team's stats</color>. Each amplification has the same limit; you can clear the unstable zones to get items that can increase the amplification limit.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to save your amplification setup as a <color=#57f0fb>template</color>. You can quickly apply a template to switch between amplification setups.

Name: Celica
Content: Each amplification has a <color=#57f0fb>special stat</color> that can help you continue exploring.

Name: Celica
Content: Once the amplification reaches <color=#57f0fb>a particular level</color>, you will get the special stat.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Perception Amplification</color> has been recovered now. Let's check it out, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: For more details, please check out the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>equip the current character with Add-On Units</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Add-On Units have powerful <color=#57f0fb>combat effects</color>, but they'll cost a certain <color=#57f0fb>load</color> as well.

Name: Celica
Content: You obtained some Add-On Units from the battle just now. You can equip your characters with them.

Name: Celica
Content: You can clear unstable zones to obtain items to <color=#57f0fb>increase</color> the <color=#57f0fb>load limit</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: For more details, please check out the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Remote connection established... Please respond if you can hear me, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: This is a chaotic consciousness space with a total of <color=#57f0fb>6 levels</color> from shallow to deep. Here shows the details of the current level you're on. You must explore and stabilize the current zone before <color=#57f0fb>linking to the next zone</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's go to the corresponding level.

Name: Celica
Content: Each consciousness level consists of multiple unstable zones. You must stabilize the current zone before linking to the next zone. The <color=#57f0fb>deeper</color> you advance, the <color=#57f0fb>stronger enemies</color> you'll face.

Name: Celica
Content: How about we stabilize the zone within 1km first?

Name: Celica
Content: Most zones have randomly generated enemies with random Affixes. Tap the enemy to check the <color=#57f0fb>Affix effect</color> on them.

Name: Celica
Content: Consider <color=#57f0fb>Restructuring</color> the zone if the enemies and Affixes are too difficult.

Name: Celica
Content: That's all the basic information. Commandant, please start clearing the 1km zone.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to check out the various <color=#57f0fb>rewards</color> you can get from exploring the zones.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Fusion Center</color> has been repaired. Go take a look!

Name: Celica
Content: You can exchange any <color=#57f0fb>unobtained Add-ons</color> with Memory Synapses in the Fusion Center.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to enter the Fusion Center.

Name: Celica
Content: You have a chance to get the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>Super-ego Add-on</color> when buying a 6★ Add-on in Fusion Center. You can <color=#57f0fb>purchase many times</color> before getting the Super-ego Add-on.

Name: Celica
Content: Once you have <color=#57f0fb>collected a certain number of Add-on of a particular ★</color>, the corresponding enhancement will be activated. Each Add-on ★ has 5 enhancements. Tap on them for more details.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, you can get <color=#57f0fb>Collection Rank</color> enhancements by collecting different types of Add-on.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view all the <color=#57f0fb>active</color> Collection Rank effects.

Name: Celica
Content: Bosses at Outlier Points will not be reset. Challenging them costs no <color=#57f0fb>challenge attempts</color> or <color=#57f0fb>Stamina</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can challenge the Bosses to complete related achievement missions and get <color=#57f0fb>Phantom Pain Scar</color> as reward. Tap to check your achievement mission progress.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, a new <color=#57f0fb>Sequence</color> is available in the True Layer. Let's check it out!

Name: Celica
Content: All stages in the True Layer can only be unlocked through the <color=#57f0fb>90km</color> Leap. Let's check out 90km first.

Name: Celica
Content: In the True Layer, stages will have different <color=#57f0fb>traits</color> based on different <color=#57f0fb>Sequences</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Sequences will change as the event time progresses. <color=#57f0fb>New Add-ons, missions, and items</color> will unlock at <color=#57f0fb>new Sequence</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Commandant, this is a popular trading game in Kowloong right now—<color=#57f0fb>Kowloong's Greatest Merchant</color>. Let me guide you to the path of riches!

Name: Pulao
Content: Don't worry if you don't know how to play. You're so smart, Commandant, you'll pick it up in no time. I'll teach you!

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap here to begin.

Name: Pulao
Content: Each stage has a set number of <color=#57f0fb>required quarters</color>. Clear the stage and gain 1st Clear Rewards by completing the required number of quarters.

Name: Pulao
Content: Completing <color=#57f0fb>Challenge Goals</color> will grant one-time rewards.

Name: Pulao
Content: Let's begin!

Name: Pulao
Content: This is the <color=#57f0fb>Main City</color>. It's where our journey begins!

Name: Pulao
Content: Let's head to this <color=#57f0fb>city</color> first, Commandant. Reaching the city will make future trades <color=#57f0fb>more profitable</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Let's go, Commandant! Take your first step as a merchant!

Name: Pulao
Content: Now, let's move on to the key elements of being a merchant. The Main City will <color=#57f0fb>produce items</color> each quarter. Let's plan out this quarter's production.

Name: Pulao
Content: There are <color=#57f0fb>three types of items</color> in total. Each of them is different, but you can only <color=#57f0fb>produce one of them</color> each quarter.

Name: Pulao
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>price</color> of each unit of item is displayed here. The item's price is affected by many things. <color=#57f0fb>Tap the icon</color> to view more details, Commandant.

Name: Pulao
Content: The item's <color=#57f0fb>yield each quarter</color> is displayed here. Again, tap the <color=#57f0fb>exclamation mark</color> for more details.

Name: Pulao
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Production</color> affects the yield in a quarter the most. Each point of Production doubles the yield.

Name: Pulao
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>estimated</color> <color=#57f0fb>total value</color> of producing an item in a quarter is displayed here based on its price and yield.

Name: Pulao
Content: Producing Crafts might seem modest at first, but the profit soars if a CRIT is triggered. It's my favorite item, so why don't we try it first?

Name: Pulao
Content: As a beginner bonus, let me increase the CRIT rate of the first two quarters for you, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Content: We've done all we can do, and we're running out of <color=#57f0fb>Exploration Points</color>. They won't recover until <color=#57f0fb>next quarter</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Let's take a break and wait for the next quarter to <color=#57f0fb>recover our Exploration Points</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: You CRIT! Getting a CRIT on your production will greatly increase this quarter's yield. You have a lot of <color=#57f0fb>Crafts</color> in stock right now. You're ready to <color=#57f0fb>trade</color> this quarter.

Name: Pulao
Content: Before trading, pay attention to how the price of each item <color=#57f0fb>fluctuates</color> in the quarter. Selling items when their price is higher will give you more Copper Coins.

Name: Pulao
Content: Before trading, pay attention to how the price of each item <color=#57f0fb>fluctuates</color> in the quarter. Selling items when their price is higher will give you more Copper Coins.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Trade</color> to plan how you <color=#57f0fb>sell items</color> this quarter.

Name: Pulao
Content: Drag here to adjust <color=#57f0fb>the number of items for sale</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Factors like the <color=#57f0fb>quarterly price fluctuation</color> mentioned earlier will affect the <color=#57f0fb>price</color> of an item. <color=#57f0fb>Tap the icon</color> for more details.

Name: Pulao
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>estimated income</color> from this Crafts sale is displayed here. The auto-calculation is very handy!

Name: Pulao
Content: Load up the items you plan to sell, and they'll be <color=#57f0fb>sold</color> together when the <color=#57f0fb>round ends</color>. You can edit it when needed.

Name: Pulao
Content: Apart from selling items at a high price, you should also sell them when they're reaching their <color=#57f0fb>stock</color> <color=#57f0fb>limit</color> to avoid loss.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap here to check an item's <color=#57f0fb>stock</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: A CRIT is triggered! A <color=#57f0fb>production CRIT</color> will greatly <color=#57f0fb>increase this quarter's yield</color>. With so many Crafts in stock, we should prepare to <color=#57f0fb>trade</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Almost forgot. The <color=#57f0fb>price</color> of items <color=#57f0fb>fluctuates</color> within <color=#57f0fb>a certain range</color> each quarter. Remember to sell them when their price is higher.

Name: Pulao
Content: The price of Crafts this quarter is quite high at this moment due to the fluctuation. Try trading now!

Name: Pulao
Content: The Crafts sale this quarter is a <color=#57f0fb>guaranteed CRIT</color>. You should <color=#57f0fb>sell all of them</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Encountering Artifact Spaces during Exploration will award you <color=#57f0fb>Artifacts</color>, granting <color=#57f0fb>bonus effects</color> to our business and journey.

Name: Pulao
Content: Choose your favorite Artifact based on <color=#57f0fb>the item you want to produce</color> and <color=#57f0fb>the Artifacts you already own</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: You have enough <color=#57f0fb>Merchant EXP</color> to <color=#57f0fb>upgrade the Main City</color>, Commandant! Let's do it!

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Next Level</color> to preview the <color=#57f0fb>bonus effects</color> after upgrading the Main City.

Name: Pulao
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Merchant EXP</color> is mainly gained from <color=#57f0fb>Exploration</color> during your journey.

Name: Pulao
Content: And you gain <color=#57f0fb>Copper Coins</color> mainly by selling items.

Name: Pulao
Content: There are many benefits to upgrading the Main City. You'll increase <color=#57f0fb>Production</color> and <color=#57f0fb>max Exploration Points</color>, and you can <color=#57f0fb>unlock new explorable areas</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: When you're not sure what to do, Commandant, aim to <color=#57f0fb>upgrade the Main City</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: We've reached a <color=#57f0fb>new city</color>. Establish trade with them to gain a massive <color=#57f0fb>item price bonus</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Each city has its own <color=#57f0fb>City Mission</color>. Completing the mission will gain their trust, and they will offer more <color=#57f0fb>extra bonuses</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: I've marked the explorable <color=#57f0fb>cities</color> for you, Commandant. Remember to <color=#57f0fb>prioritize cities</color> during Exploration!

Name: Pulao
Content: There is a chance to <color=#57f0fb>CRIT</color> when producing or selling items, greatly increasing the yield or the sale.

Name: Pulao
Content: Some rare Relics will increase the <color=#57f0fb>CRIT stat</color>. Don't forget them when you encounter one!

Name: Pulao
Content: There is a chance to <color=#57f0fb>CRIT</color> when producing or selling items, greatly increasing the yield or the sale.

Name: Pulao
Content: Commandant, you've encountered... a <color=#57f0fb>Building</color>! It will provide <color=#57f0fb>special features</color> after you <color=#57f0fb>spend Copper Coins</color> to build it.

Name: Pulao
Content: Construct Buildings as soon as possible after you discover them, Commandant! Let's <color=#57f0fb>collect some Copper Coins to build it</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: There are <color=#57f0fb>two other types</color> of Buildings apart from the Wishing Well. You'll find out if you keep playing, Commandant.

Name: Pulao
Content: I snooped around while we were building the Wishing Well, Commandant. The well will let you make a wish <color=#57f0fb>every few quarters</color> after it's built.

Name: Pulao
Content: There will be a <color=#57f0fb>notification</color> here if there are <color=#57f0fb>unused</color> wishes. Can I wish to become rich overnight, Commandant?

Name: Pulao
Content: Congratulations, Commandant! You've passed the test and completed all <color=#57f0fb>Challenge Goals</color> in this stage. You'll gain a <color=#57f0fb>one-time reward</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: When <color=#57f0fb>the game ends</color>, you will gain <color=#57f0fb>points</color> according to <color=#57f0fb>your Copper Coins, Main City Level, cities explored</color>, and more.

Name: Pulao
Content: Your <color=#57f0fb>final score</color> is displayed here. Your score is so much higher than mine in my first game, Commandant! Well done!

Name: Pulao
Content: Points will be <color=#57f0fb>converted into Coins according to the rules</color>, which you can use to <color=#57f0fb>exchange rewards at the shop</color> outside. Don't forget about them!

Name: Pulao
Content: You've already unlocked <color=#57f0fb>Technology</color>, Commandant! Each Technology here will grant you <color=#57f0fb>global effects</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>unlock Technology</color> by <color=#57f0fb>spending Copper Coins</color>! What a deal!

Name: Pulao
Content: Unfortunately, the more powerful Technologies can't be unlocked right now. Check back after you've <color=#57f0fb>upgraded the Main City</color>, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Content: Starting with the Intermediate Merchant stage, you'll find different <color=#57f0fb>Genesis Artifacts</color> in different stages!

Name: Pulao
Content: You'll get more profit if you <color=#57f0fb>adjust your business strategy</color> based on the effect of the Genesis Artifact. Let's begin if you're ready, Commandant.

Name: Pulao
Content: This sale has also triggered a CRIT! A <color=#57f0fb>sale CRIT</color> will greatly <color=#57f0fb>increase</color> the <color=#57f0fb>profit</color> of this sale. You've earned a lot of Copper Coins!

Name: Pulao
Content: Copper Coins can be used to <color=#57f0fb>upgrade the Main City</color>. Kowloong players also compete to see <color=#57f0fb>how many Copper Coins they can accumulate</color>! Earn as many Copper Coins as you can, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Magic Square Bounce</color>, Commandant! Dash, jump, and dodge obstacles! Barrage the boss with bombs of three colors!

Name: Celica
Content: Magic Square Bounce has <color=#57f0fb>two modes</color>. The hard mode will be unlocked over time. Once unlocked, you can switch the difficulty to join or create a corresponding room.

Name: Celica
Content: You can always enter the <color=#57f0fb>Tutorial Mode</color> to learn more about the <color=#57f0fb>rules</color> of this challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's enter the Tutorial stage now!

Name: Celica
Content: Magic Square Bounce has <color=#57f0fb>two modes</color>. The hard mode will be unlocked over time. Once unlocked, you can switch the difficulty to join or create a corresponding room.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Lightning and Thunder</color>. Vera will take the lead on this whole new adventure!

Name: Celica
Content: In this operation, Synergy Skills have been enhanced. Tap here to view the <color=#57f0fb>squad tactics</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Synergy Switch is still available in this operation. Trigger Time Lag Calculation during the switch and summon your teammate's aid!

Name: Celica
Content: Cerberus members all have different skill effects. Tap here to view their skills.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>This adventure is a limited-time challenge</color>. Don't miss it, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>This adventure is a limited-time challenge</color>. Don't miss it, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Norman Revival Plan</color>, Commandant. You have to lead multiple teams simultaneously in this challenge if you want to conquer the mines.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap a chapter to enter the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Norman Revival Plan</color> has started.

Name: Celica
Content: Completing a Deep Hive to auto clear all stages in this mine at once.

Name: Celica
Content: Clear Connect stages to lower the difficulty of the Deep Hive.

Name: Celica
Content: Different sites will provide bonuses to the corresponding main elements. Elements without a corresponding site will gain a smaller bonus.

Name: Celica
Content: Each team can set up different Energy Field effects for different bonuses.

Name: Celica
Content: When all teams are filled, you can gain the Perfect Tactics bonus if their average Battle Power exceeds the requirements of Perfect Tactics.

Name: Celica
Content: Spend Electricity to increase a team's Battle Power, but pay attention to the Electricity limit of some stages and missions.

Name: Celica
Content: Battles in mines require teams of different elements fighting at the appropriate stages. Don't forget to assemble different elemental teams before you start.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Quick Deploy to quickly set up your teams.

Name: Teddy
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Wreck-It Bear</color>, Commandant.

Name: Teddy
Content: Go ahead and select a stage to enter.

Name: Teddy
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>turn limit</color> of the current stage is displayed here.

Name: Teddy
Content: You can check the <color=#57f0fb>item types</color> that may randomly drop in the stage.

Name: Teddy
Content: Alright, let's start the challenge.

Name: Teddy
Content: After selecting a cube, you can <color=#57f0fb>move it horizontally</color> to <color=#57f0fb>nearby</color> vacant spaces.

Name: Teddy
Content: You obtained an <color=#57f0fb>item</color> from the row cleared just now. Tap to check its effect and use it.

Name: Teddy
Content: When there are enough vacant spaces below, cubes will <color=#57f0fb>automatically drop down and fill the gaps</color>. When a row is <color=#57f0fb>filled</color> with cubes, it will be cleared.

Name: Teddy
Content: After every turn, all cubes will <color=#57f0fb>move upward</color>. You can check the <color=#57f0fb>preview</color> of the upcoming row layout here.

Name: Teddy
Content: Every time you move a cube, it costs you 1 turn. When <color=#57f0fb>the number of your remaining turns falls to 0</color>, the stage will end.

Name: Teddy
Content: When the cubes <color=#57f0fb>stack over the top</color> of the board, the stage will end as well.

Name: Teddy
Content: You can store up to <color=#57f0fb>4 items</color> and can no longer obtain more after reaching the maximum storage limit. Make sure to use your items timely, Commandant.

Name: Teddy
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>check the item effects</color> here. Using items will <color=#57f0fb>not cost you turns</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Heehee, welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Pulao's Odyssey</color>, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Content: Go ahead and select a <color=#57f0fb>gap</color> in the sentence.

Name: Pulao
Content: Choose words to fill the <color=#57f0fb>gaps</color> and complete the story.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap the <color=#57f0fb>Remove</color> button, and you can remove the filled words.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Reset</color> to revert the sentences to their initial state.

Name: Pulao
Content: You can view the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>sentence effects</color> here. Try different combinations of words to make me stronger!

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> to embark on the adventure with me! By the way, <color=#57f0fb>I'm unstoppable</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: If the enemies get really tough to deal with, you can consider selecting the <color=#57f0fb>default enemy words</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Try to change the enemy <color=#57f0fb>sentence effects</color> to give me a better chance at defeating them!

Name: Lucia
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Spring Gala</color>, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: The gala includes <color=#57f0fb>3 chapters: Start Anew, Lanterns Lit, and Full Moon</color>, which open in different time periods. Now, select <color=#57f0fb>Start Anew</color> to enter.

Name: Lucia
Content: Select the first stage: [Tutorial - Passage].

Name: Lucia
Content: This is the preview of the Temple Fair's <color=#57f0fb>initial terrain</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here you can see the decoration objective of the Temple Fair. Clear the stage by obtaining <color=#57f0fb>1 star</color> and collect as many stars as possible.

Name: Lucia
Content: Without further ado, let's kick off the Temple Fair decoration!

Name: Lucia
Content: First, let's understand the <color=#57f0fb>stage rules</color>. You need to place tiles in accordance with the rules to earn points. <color=#57f0fb>Tap the rules to review the details.</color>

Name: Lucia
Content: Based on the <color=#57f0fb>Place - Peach Tree</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Adjacent - Peachy Stream</color> rules, we need to select a <color=#57f0fb>Peach Tree</color> tile in the <color=#57f0fb>Tile Area</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Tap the Peach Tree tile</color>, and this tile will show up in the <color=#57f0fb>Decoration Area</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: As indicated by the <color=#57f0fb>Point Tip</color> on the left, you can see <color=#57f0fb>the rule met</color> by the current tile placement and the <color=#57f0fb>points</color> you will receive.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> to place the tile. After it's placed, the points earned will be added to your <color=#57f0fb>Total Score</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here are some special Initial Tiles with <color=#57f0fb>Score Mark</color> displayed above.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap a tile to check the Initial Tile's <color=#57f0fb>scoring requirement</color>. By meeting the requirement, you will obtain the corresponding points.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tiles that <color=#57f0fb>come with points</color> will show up in the Tile Area. After a tile of this type is placed, you will obtain the points immediately.

Name: Lucia
Content: Try to prioritize selecting tiles that <color=#57f0fb>come with points</color> during the decoration.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Chess Wonderland</color>. This event is turn-based.

Name: Celica
Content: Use Luna to take on the white pieces. You win when <color=#57f0fb>the White King is defeated</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: When you finish a move, click on the attack icon to launch an attack.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Adjust attack location</color> by clicking on the blue zone.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap on <color=#57f0fb>the highlighted zone to move</color>.\nPlease be warned that if you <color=#57f0fb>enter the red zone, you will be attacked by your opponent at the end of the turn</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Click "Confirm" to attack!

Name: Celica
Content: Defeat the White King and win the match!

Name: Celica
Content: When Luna attacks, Lucia will offer Swordwave Support by the side, <color=#57f0fb>dealing more damage to the center point</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Above a chess piece displays its remaining HP after the attack, and the damage dealt is displayed on the floor. Confirm to execute the attack.

Name: Celica
Content: In this stage, you will be taken through some basic information about the white pieces and strategies to cope with them.

Name: Celica
Content: When the white side is moving a piece, you can check its range of movement and the time left for it to finish its move by clicking on the piece.

Name: Celica
Content: The red zone is the area within which a white piece can move and attack. If <color=#57f0fb>Luna is in the red zone when a round is over, she falls prey to the white side.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: In the bottom right corner of the screen, you will see how many more rounds there are left until a piece can make a move. When <color=#57f0fb>you see the number become a movement icon, it means the piece is ready to make a move.</color>

Name: Celica
Content: Deploy Luna again to defeat the White King and win the match!

Name: Celica
Content: Luna has unlocked Crimson Chakram, enabling her to take a leap within 3 blocks and evade danger!

Name: Celica
Content: Upon casting Crimson Chakram, Luna deals damage to pieces near both the starting and ending points of her leap.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Confirm to cast the skill!

Name: Celica
Content: Now, go on and finish the rest of the battle!

Name: Celica
Content: When you feel overwhelmed by a match, you can switch to Top View to get a better view of the match!

Name: Celica
Content: The White Bishops are now in the match!

Name: Celica
Content: Click to read about their abilities and range of movement. The White Bishops should not be taken lightly.

Name: Celica
Content: Luna has unlocked Whisper of Annihilation! With this skill, she can instantly wipe out the Bishops within the central zone, eliminate the Knights with the splash damage, and summon Lucia to attack enemies in a row.

Name: Celica
Content: Deploy Luna again to defeat the White King and win the match!

Name: Celica
Content: Additionally, a new "Revert" feature has been added to the game. By using it, you can revert the game to the initial state of the last round.

Name: Celica
Content: Luna has unlocked Descending Moon, which costs 15 Energy to cast. This skill can enhance her power and summon Lucia to aid her on the battlefield!

Name: Celica
Content: Both taking down pieces and ending a round will restore Energy, while casting Whisper of Annihilation will grant Energy!

Name: Celica
Content: Lucia will not be attacked by enemy pieces and can move for 2 rounds.

Name: Celica
Content: Deploy Lucia to defeat the King!

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Confirm to cast the skill.

Name: Celica
Content: Advance one block to find the optimal attacking position.

Name: Celica
Content: Cast Descending Moon and let Lucia join the battle!

Name: Celica
Content: The White Rook is now in the match!

Name: Celica
Content: The Rook has an HP of 7 and moves either horizontally or vertically. Lucia's Signature Move can wipe it out immediately.

Name: Celica
Content: Watch out for the Pawns at the bottom line of the board.

Name: Celica
Content: When a Pawn reaches the bottom line, it can be promoted to any chess piece other than the King. Pawns are not to be taken lightly!

Name: Celica
Content: Reinforcement Illusions will occasionally appear on the board and enter the battle once the countdown ends. Keep an eye out for them!

Name: Celica
Content: Lucia has unlocked Drifting Shadow, which allows her to swap positions with Luna and deal damage.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, go on and finish the rest of the battle.

Name: Celica
Content: In Hard Game, <color=#57f0fb>some pieces come with an affix</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: To see the effects of an affix, click the chess with an icon in the top right corner of the screen.

Name: Celica
Content: The White Queen is now in the match!

Name: Celica
Content: The Queen has an HP of 10 and moves in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal directions. She is a formidable enemy unit and must be handled with caution!

Name: Celica
Content: New board effects have been added to Expanded Game. You can view them by swiping the left column.

Name: Celica
Content: Use the Monochrome Block effect to win the match!

Name: Lee
Content: Commandant, as you can see, a new <color=#57f0fb>time frame mechanism</color> has been introduced in this stage. Let me walk you through it.

Name: Lee
Content: The stage is now divided into 4 time frames: <color=#57f0fb>Morning, Noon, Evening, and Night</color>.

Name: Lee
Content: The number below represents <color=#57f0fb>the remaining rounds within the current time frame</color>. Once all rounds are <color=#57f0fb>used up</color>, the stage will <color=#57f0fb>transition to the next time frame</color>.

Name: Lee
Content: Here shows the <color=#57f0fb>active time frame</color> for rules. When a rule is highlighted, it means it's effective in the current time frame.

Name: Lee
Content: We're currently in the <color=#57f0fb>[Morning]</color> time frame, so you need to decorate the Temple Fair according to <color=#57f0fb>rules effective during [Morning]</color>. Now, select the Market tile.

Name: Lee
Content: Confirm to <color=#57f0fb>place</color> the tile.

Name: Lee
Content: The time frame has shifted to <color=#57f0fb>[Noon]</color>. <color=#57f0fb>The tiles currently in place will only award points based on the rules effective during [Noon].</color>

Name: Lee
Content: Points awarded by rules effective during two time frames will be <color=#57f0fb>calculated separately for each of the two time frames</color>.

Name: Lee
Content: Total Score = <color=#57f0fb>points earned in the current time frame</color> + <color=#57f0fb>points calculated from previous time frames</color>

Name: Lee
Content: That's the end of the introduction. Let's finish the rest of the Temple Fair decoration together.

Name: Bambinata
Content: Bambinata wants to let you know that <color=#57f0fb>skipping</color> could be a good choice sometimes.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Clearing <color=#57f0fb>Battle Nodes</color> during the calculation will accumulate <color=#57f0fb>Overflow Value</color>. Once it's full, <color=#57f0fb>Iterative Projection</color> will be triggered.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: It's totally fine if you're not getting it yet—it's not like I'm an expert either. Just give it a try first, and I'm sure you'll figure it out.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Pick a difficulty level you want to tackle. If I were you, I'd choose with caution.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Iterative Projection will offer three random characters, and you can pick one of them to <color=#57f0fb>gain a potent special effect</color> that will be active for <color=#57f0fb>the current calculation</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: This effect seems pretty powerful. Choose the character for <color=#57f0fb>Iterative Projection</color> wisely.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Invader... Welcome to... <color=#57f0fb>this world</color>...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: I suppose you have noticed it by now... There's this concept called <color=#57f0fb>Entropy</color> in this world... causing various ripples and effects...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Artifacts</color> in this world... are all affected by Entropy, undergoing various changes... You should collect as many as you can...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: I suppose you have noticed it by now... There's this concept called <color=#57f0fb>Entropy</color> in this world... causing various ripples and effects...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Invader... we meet again... However, things seem different... this time...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Perhaps that higher existence... has something to do with it...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Currently, this world and another world are... entangled... <color=#57f0fb>Entropy</color> of the two worlds will... influence each other...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: And it seems you possess the ability to <color=#57f0fb>travel freely</color> between the two worlds... Astounding... Could this too be the work of that one...?

Name: Celica
Content: At the start of each round, the <color=#57f0fb>Leader</color> will choose a difficulty. Keep in mind that the required <color=#57f0fb>member BP</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Activity</color> levels increase with difficulty.

Name: Celica
Content: If no difficulty is chosen, the system will <color=#57f0fb>automatically</color> select one for you.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to view <color=#57f0fb>map layout</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Right here is the <color=#57f0fb>Event Guide</color>. Tap to explore the details of nodes and the guide on how to tackle them!

Name: Celica
Content: A new node called <color=#57f0fb>Resource Security Area</color> has been introduced in this operation. Periodically, the Sovereign will initiate a remote bombardment attack on the Resource Security Area, during which you can enter the area to <color=#57f0fb>defend</color> it.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, enter the <color=#57f1fb>Resource Security Area</color> and tap <color=#57f1fb>Station</color> to defend the node.

Name: Celica
Content: The Resource Security Area with <color=#57f1fb>the most defenders</color> will withstand the Sovereign's attack once, and the next resource node targeted by the Sovereign will be indicated in the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Guild Expedition</color> consists of <color=#57f0fb>3 rounds of battles</color>. Players must enter <color=#57f0fb>before the start of a round</color> to <color=#57f0fb>take part</color> in this round.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Guild Expedition</color> consists of <color=#57f0fb>3 rounds of battles</color>. Players must enter <color=#57f0fb>before the start of a round</color> to <color=#57f0fb>take part</color> in this round.

Name: Celica
Content: You can assign a <color=#57f0fb>Support Character</color> to join the expedition. They will help the other players at the Command Bureau with the battle!

Name: Celica
Content: Select a support character suitable for this expedition and adjust their weapons and Memories on the support page.

Name: Celica
Content: After setting up your support characters, they will receive expedition loot according to their work time and number of deployments. Remember to claim it in time.

Name: Celica
Content: When the Boss reaches Lv.3, you can challenge it via <color=#57f0fb>Custom Mode</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: When the Boss is defeated, it will <color=#57f0fb>revive and level up</color>. You may challenge it again for more rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Take down <color=#57f0fb>Hetero-Wolf</color> within the time limit to enhance the power of the entire team!

Name: Celica
Content: Tap a consumable supply to proceed to the corresponding area. Keep in mind that you can only move to an <color=#57f0fb>unobstructed</color> zone <color=#57f0fb>within one block's distance</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can view the ranking board here, which includes the total ranking as well as stage rankings for the 3 stages.

Name: Celica
Content: The total ranking is determined by summing up the ranks of all the challenging teams and then sorting them based on the total of the shortest durations in each level's high clearance records.

Name: Celica
Content: The stage ranking is sorted based on the shortest time in the highest scoring team after calculating the sum of the team ranks in the corresponding stage.

Name: Celica
Content: The data of the rankings refreshes once every 10 minutes.

Name: Celica
Content: Choosing different Affixes in Babel Tower will increase the difficulty level of a stage and the rewards to be obtained.

Name: Celica
Content: If you find a stage challenging, you may decrease the stage level and challenge it multiple times using other teams.

Name: Lucia
Content: After you confirm to place a tile, <color=#57f0fb>the corresponding required rounds will be used</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Here display the <color=#57f0fb>required rounds</color> of a tile.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Once all rounds are used up, the stage will end for point calculation</color>, with points accumulated in the time frames contributing to the <color=#57f0fb>total score</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Try to get as many points as possible based on the <color=#57f0fb>currently effective tile placement rules</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, welcome to the <color=#57f0fb>Lanterns Lit — Duo Puzzle</color> event introduced by the Temple Fair! Now, tap to enter the first stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the character to <color=#57f0fb>open the member list</color>, and select a member you like to complete the game. You can <color=#57f0fb>unlock Valentine's Day Message</color> by completing any stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Start and complete this [Heart] puzzle!

Name: Celica
Content: In the puzzle game, <color=#57f0fb>the Construct is in charge of selecting tiles and placing them</color>, while you are tasked with <color=#57f0fb>moving, deleting, rotating tiles, and confirming their placement</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: A stage ends once all rounds are used up, allowing you to unlock character messages. With 3 messages collected, you can unlock the Quick Tally feature.

Name: Celica
Content: There is no unique answer to the game, so follow your heart and create the pattern you have in mind.

Name: Celica
Content: You can join the operation by using supplies. The operation is timed at <color=#57f0fb>4 minutes</color>. <color=#57f0fb>The quicker you complete it</color>, the more points you will earn and the greater damage you will deal to a node.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Nexus Trek</color>. The operation requires a Fire team, featuring the Ignition mechanism during execution.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to enter the challenge, and let's learn about the Ignition effect!

Name: Celica
Content: Now, enter the challenge again! Get ready for the Loop of Fire tutorial.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Power Compensation</color> is now unlocked. Tap here to equip!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Attack Skills can inflict Combustible</color> and will trigger the Attack Skill of the next grid.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Buff Skills</color> can <color=#57f0fb>enhance </color>the <color=#57f0fb>Attack Skills</color> of all grids behind.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, equip Power Compensation on the Link.

Name: Celica
Content: As you progress through the challenges, more Link Skills will be unlocked!

Name: Celica
Content: Return to the operation.

Name: Celica
Content: Time to start the operation with the new Link!

Name: Celica
Content: Buff Skills will enhance the Attack Skills below. <color=#57f0fb>It's advisable to place them above Attack Skills</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Circuit Connect: Cosmos Star</color>! Ping orbs to deal damage to the Boss. The more you ping, the higher your score.

Name: Celica
Content: Choose a Boss and enter Battle Preparations.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Switch Character to change the character in battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can check the different <color=#57f0fb>skill effects</color> of characters.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap on "Battle Starts" to start the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: For more details, please check out the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to view the corresponding Boss' details. You can choose appropriate strategies based on the Boss' <color=#57f0fb>features</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Characters have different <color=#57f0fb>Energy Types</color>. They can deal bonus DMG when their Energy Type matches the Boss' Weakness Type.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap two <color=#57f0fb>adjacent Signal Orbs</color> to swap them. When three or more Signal Orbs are aligned, they will be cleared.

Name: Celica
Content: Pay attention to here! The round ends when the number of remaining Turns is 0.

Name: Celica
Content: You can view the <color=#57f0fb>Buff effects</color> of the Boss and <color=#57f0fb>the countdown until the next skill</color> the Boss will cast here.

Name: Celica
Content: By <color=#57f0fb>clearing orbs in certain ways</color>, items will appear on the board. Make use of the item system to win more points!

Name: Celica
Content: A new <color=#57f0fb>item system</color> has been introduced in Circuit Connect this time. Tap here to view the details.

Name: Celica
Content: The combo from clearing Signal Orbs is converted into <color=#57f0fb>Finishing Move Energy</color>. You can activate the character's Finishing Move after accumulating enough Finishing Move Energy. It will enter cooldown upon activation.

Name: Celica
Content: An item has appeared on the board, ready for use. You can either <color=#57f0fb>swap the item orb with an adjacent Signal Orb</color> or <color=#57f0fb>double-tap the item orb</color> to activate the item.

Name: Celica
Content: If <color=#57f0fb>an item orb is pinged</color> by another item orb's effect or a character skill, it will be activated as well.

Name: Celica
Content: In Circuit Connect this time, the Boss skill has been updated to calling forth their own Summons onto the board.

Name: Celica
Content: By <color=#57f0fb>pinging orbs in the 4 grids adjacent to a Summon</color>, or by <color=#57f0fb>hitting</color> the Summon through an item orb's effect or a character skill, you can inflict damage on the Summon.

Name: Celica
Content: After taking damage <color=#57f0fb>a certain number of times</color>, a Summon will be eliminated, <color=#57f0fb>triggering a clearing effect</color>. It's advisable to prioritize eliminating Summons!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Limit Break</color>! Focus on devising strategies based on enemy abilities in this operation to surmount challenges and unlock abundant rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, select the first stage to start the challenge!

Name: Celica
Content: By tapping the empty space, you can add enemies to this stage and equip them with Enhancement Affixes.

Name: Celica
Content: The selected enemy combination will generate Pressure. The greater the Pressure, the higher the points you will earn in this stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can have a preview of the points that you will earn from the current combination.

Name: Celica
Content: While a Quick Configure feature is also accessible, I still advise you to make your own decisions.

Name: Celica
Content: Here, you can review details about the stage's environment. Remember to consider this information when customizing the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the Environment information.

Name: Celica
Content: Starting from this stage, you need to select one from three conflicting Affixes to equip on each enemy.

Name: Celica
Content: Select an enemy.

Name: Celica
Content: These three Affixes are conflicting. Please choose one from them and start the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: The Hard mode is now unlocked. You can challenge stages in this mode to earn additional points.

Name: Celica
Content: Go ahead and give it a try!

Name: Lucia
Content: Welcome to the <color=#57f0fb>Crouching Cat, Hidden Rat</color> party game, Commandant! This party features 2 maps that <color=#57f0fb>automatically rotate</color> daily at 07:00.

Name: Lucia
Content: At the end of each game, you will receive <color=#57f0fb>tokens</color>. Note that you cannot earn tokens after you have reached the daily <color=#57f0fb>limit</color>. The limit is reset at 07:00 (UTC) every day.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap Match to enter the matchmaking queue and look for a game. <color=#57f0fb>Once matched, you will immediately enter the battle</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: You can invite your friends to play together (up to 3 players in each team). <color=#57f0fb>When all team members are ready</color>, they will enter <color=#57f0fb>matchmaking</color> together.

Name: Pulao
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Pulao's Cultivation</color>, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Content: Go ahead and select a <color=#57f0fb>gap</color> in the sentence.

Name: Pulao
Content: Choose words to fill the <color=#57f0fb>gaps</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Continue filling in the words to <color=#57f0fb>complete the story</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Enter Adventure</color> to view the <color=#57f0fb>sentence effects</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: You can view the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>sentence effects</color> here. Try different combinations of words to make me stronger!

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> to embark on the legendary adventure with me!

Name: Celica
Content: New <color=#57f0fb>basic abilities</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Connection Enhanced effects</color> have been added to the Abyssal Mountain Mine in this update.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view the <color=#57f0fb>basic abilities</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Both the enemies and Commandant will receive enhanced abilities in the battle. Choose the right method to defeat the enemy effectively.

Name: Celica
Content: We have also created new <color=#57f0fb>Perfect Tactics</color> effects based on the battlefield environment. Use them wisely.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Greetings, the Chosen One. We have been ordered to add something new to the calculation.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: After choosing the <color=#57f0fb>Iteration Artifacts</color>, <color=#57f0fb>Collapse Points</color> will appear in the game. You can obtain items in the shop that increase the calculation difficulty and accumulate <color=#57f0fb>Calculation Peaks</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: After each game, the <color=#57f0fb>highest</color> <color=#57f0fb>Calculation Peak</color> will be recorded here. <color=#57f0fb>Iteration Artifacts</color> of a higher difficulty will also be unlocked. Good luck!

Name: Pulao
Content: We just received a <color=#57f0fb>Sect Relic</color>. Let's check out its effects.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap sentences of different colors to <color=#57f0fb>delete the corresponding effects</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Use the Relic to <color=#57f0fb>delete sentences from the story</color> and remove the corresponding effects to <color=#57f0fb>weaken the enemy</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Sometimes, the stage may contain <color=#57f0fb>locked</color> words, which can be <color=#57f0fb>unlocked</color> after you use the Relic to <color=#57f0fb>delete certain sentences</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Clearing with <color=#57f0fb>unlocked words</color> will unlock <color=#57f0fb>hidden stage stories</color>.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Delete Sentence</color> to <color=#57f0fb>unlock the word</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Commandant, it's been a while. My workshop has finally opened a store in Kowloong. Come check it out.

Name: Lucia
Content: I have always wanted to collaborate with Kowloong to open a store with local flair. This wish has finally come true.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Hanying</color> will be in charge this time, but I'll drop by whenever possible. Without further ado, let's hear what they are discussing.

Name: Hanying
Content: First, let's decide on what handcraft to <color=#57f0fb>sell</color> today.

Name: Hanying
Content: Select the handcraft to sell.

Name: Hanying
Content: Then assign a staff to sell it. Staff <color=#57f0fb>with bonuses</color> can generate higher income.

Name: Hanying
Content: Let's get familiar with the process of making a <color=#57f0fb>handcraft</color>.

Name: Hanying
Content: Welcome back to Working Lulu, Commandant!

Name: Hanying
Content: I have a secret to share with you.

Name: Hanying
Content: From <color=#57f0fb>daily missions</color>, you can get <color=#57f0fb>Special Sundials</color> that reduce the time required when used.

Name: Pulao
Content: <color=#57f1fb>Upgrade the store</color> to unlock more popular handcrafts! Earn as much as you can, Commandant! (=?ω｀=)

Name: Pulao
Content: Here's a tip, Commandant. You can tap the Swap button here to quickly swap Staff.

Name: Pulao
Content: Tap this Swap button to quickly swap the handcrafts/materials.

Name: Pulao
Content: Take a photo to record this busy moment, Commandant!

Name: Pulao
Content: Let's check out the <color=#57f1fb>Prep Station</color>!

Name: Pulao
Content: Make sure to tick all of our photo shooting objectives!

Name: Pulao
Content: Use the joystick to adjust your vision.

Name: Pulao
Content: Now press the shutter to take the photo.

Name: Pulao
Content: Welcome back to Working Lulu, Commandant!

Name: Hanying
Content: Commandant, the <color=#57f1fb>Buff</color> feature is now available.

Name: Hanying
Content: Here is an overview of the staff with active buffs and buff effects. Use them wisely with <color=#57f1fb>staff</color> skills to earn more <color=#57f1fb>income</color>.

Name: Hanying
Content: Welcome back to Working Lulu, Commandant!

Name: Hanying
Content: Upgrade the store to unlock more <color=#57f1fb>effects</color>, <color=#57f1fb>handcrafts</color>, and <color=#57f1fb>renovations</color>, as well as more store events or orders.

Name: Hanying
Content: Once you've met the upgrade conditions, you can upgrade the store with <color=#57f1fb>Lulu Dragon Coins</color>.

Name: Hanying
Content: Here's an <color=#57f1fb>order</color> from Lucia. We need to craft and deliver it.

Name: Hanying
Content: You can get <color=#57f1fb>hidden handcrafts</color> by completing customer orders.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: In the Collapse Points, you can get Artifacts that increase the calculation difficulty. After purchasing them, you will receive <color=#57f0fb>Processing Units</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Calculation Peaks</color>.

Name: Hanying
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Crafting Station</color> is located further inside.

Name: Hanying
Content: Let's start <color=#57f0fb>crafting</color>.

Name: Hanying
Content: Select a handcraft to craft.

Name: Hanying
Content: Choose a staff with a bonus effect for this handcraft.

Name: Hanying
Content: At the very back is the <color=#57f0fb>Prep Station</color>. When it comes to material production, speed is the key.

Name: Hanying
Content: This is the final step in crafting.

Name: Hanying
Content: I suggest you choose a material that is <color=#57f0fb>currently being used</color>. It's always good to be prepared.

Name: Hanying
Content: Lulu's employees will not let us down.

Name: Hanying
Content: Welcome back to Working Lulu, Commandant!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Special Dispatch - Coordinated Simulation</color>. In this operation, you will fight alongside all commandants in the server to clear the blocks and unlock bountiful rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: By clearing blocks, you can obtain <color=#57f0fb>server rewards</color> and unlock <color=#57f0fb>adjacent blocks</color>. Different types of blocks provide various <color=#57f0fb>server rewards</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: For more contents, please check out the Image Guide.

Name: Celica
Content: In addition, you can also get <color=#57f0fb>Trial Prototypes</color> from daily block battles and completing event missions, and exchange them for awesome rewards in <color=#57f0fb>Special Supplies</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Special Missions</color> are a new feature in this operation, which requires your <color=#57f0fb>independent completion</color>. Complete these missions to obtain EXP and gradually unlock power bonuses.

Name: Celica
Content: Other teams may encounter dangers during their exploration. You can dispatch characters to <color=#57f0fb>support</color> them.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Special Missions</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Support Missions</color> refresh daily at 05:00 (UTC).

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Sweet Respite</color>. Let's help Wanshi arrange his schedule and achieve perfect sleep.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's begin with a short midday nap.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to select a Sleep Time grid, and tap again to cancel selection.

Name: Celica
Content: After selecting a <color=#57f0fb>starting grid</color>, you can tap to select an adjacent time grid or <color=#57f0fb>hold and swipe</color> to select it.

Name: Celica
Content: Now that you have collected <color=#57f0fb>2 time units</color>, go ahead and try to execute this schedule.

Name: Celica
Content: Time grids that <color=#57f0fb>exceed</color> the Sleep Goal will <color=#57f0fb>remain after moving</color>. Select time grids from left to right and connect them to Wanshi to start his sleep.

Name: Celica
Content: Go ahead and finish the rest of the schedule planning.

Name: Celica
Content: When Kamui is in the room, he will repeatedly check if Wanshi really falls asleep. Apparently, this will only disrupt Wanshi's sleep.

Name: Celica
Content: The estimated sleep schedule will be <color=#57f0fb>extended by 3 time units</color>. Consequently, you need to allocate additional time to help Wanshi achieve his sleep goal.

Name: Celica
Content: Go ahead and finish the rest of the schedule planning.

Name: Celica
Content: When you select time grids and connect them to Chrome, the grids will be immediately cleared. However, Chrome will reserve <color=#57f0fb>1 time unit</color> for Wanshi's rest.

Name: Celica
Content: Chrome can help adjust the positions of other character events. When you find an event grid obstructing, you may try to relocate the event grid.

Name: Celica
Content: You don't have to trigger all character events. Plan the schedule wisely and make the most of the time.

Name: Celica
Content: Once a block has reached 100% progress, it will be cleared. You will then receive the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>server reward</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can participate in the battle by consuming Floating Computing Power. <color=#57f0fb>The higher the rating</color> you earn in a stage, <color=#57f0fb>the better the rewards</color> you will get.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandants who choose to dispatch <color=#57f0fb>do not need to actually take part in the battle</color>. They can simply consume Floating Computing Power to earn <color=#57f0fb>fixed rewards</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete <color=#57f0fb>Special Missions</color> to obtain <color=#57f0fb>Operation Disks</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Simulation Disks</color>, which can be used to increase personal and server Dispatch Level.

Name: Celica
Content: Other teams may encounter dangers during their exploration. You can dispatch characters to <color=#57f0fb>support</color> them.

Name: Celica
Content: By offering support, you can obtain <color=#57f0fb>Scheduling Requests</color>. Consume <color=#57f0fb>Scheduling Requests</color> to immediately complete <color=#57f0fb>Special Missions</color>. You can only obtain support rewards <color=#57f0fb>twice</color> per day.

Name: Celica
Content: After clearing a <color=#57f0fb>Character Block</color>, you will receive the corresponding <color=#57f0fb>Special Character and Character Combat Amplification</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Unlock and collect more Special Characters to earn bonus <color=#57f0fb>Trial Prototypes</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: If you have received support from other commandants the previous day, you can <color=#57f0fb>immediately claim</color> Special Mission rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Don't forget to show your appreciation to the commandant who lends you a hand when you claim the rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Completing <color=#57f0fb>Special Missions</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Support Missions</color> will increase your personal <color=#57f0fb>Dispatch Record</color> level, and the server-wide <color=#57f0fb>All-Realm Record</color> level.

Name: Celica
Content: By increasing your personal Dispatch Record level, you can unlock <color=#57f0fb>battle bonuses</color> and the <color=#57f0fb>Multi Challenge</color> feature.

Name: Celica
Content: The All-Realm Record level is shared by the server, providing <color=#57f0fb>Stat bonuses</color> for all commandants.

Name: Celica
Content: A certain amount of Trial Prototypes will be produced in <color=#57f0fb>Phase Results</color>. This amount <color=#57f0fb>will increase over time</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: As you clear the Dark blocks of the four areas, tokens will be produced at a higher <color=#57f0fb>rate</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Now is the time for <color=#57f0fb>Repeated Simulation</color>. You can still use Computing Power to take part in the battle, but no block Contribution will be earned.

Name: Celica
Content: In Repeated Simulations, you will earn <color=#57f0fb>a fixed amount of</color> Trial Prototypes at the end of battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Infinity Algorithm</color>. Here, characters will receive a variety of <color=#57f0fb>Effect</color> boosts that help overcome the challenges ahead.

Name: Celica
Content: There are two chapters in this event, which will be unlocked over time. Let's enter Chapter <color=#57f0fb>Ultima Slash</color> - Soul Disintegration first.

Name: Celica
Content: Only specified characters can be deployed in this chapter, each granted the <color=#57f0fb>Ultima Slash</color> buff. The buff effects will be unlocked as you progress through the stages.

Name: Celica
Content: You can tap a character portrait or the buff icon to view the <color=#57f0fb>buff effect details</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: There are various environments in the <color=#57f0fb>Entropic Distortion</color> zone, where you can select any of the available Environment Affixes to start the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Entropic Distortion</color> zone is now unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Full-Realm Support</color> that frames receive is effective under all Environment Affixes in the current zone.

Name: Celica
Content: Your operation points in this zone are determined by <color=#57f0fb>the highest points</color> achieved under these Environment Affixes. Please plan your operation wisely by deploying suitable frames.

Name: Celica
Content: The time grids that exceed the current schedule plan will not be cleared. The <color=#57f0fb>remaining time</color> will stay after being moved, which you can use for other schedule plans.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>time grids selected</color> before Art Edification will be extended by 1 time unit.

Name: Celica
Content: Art edification can be a great way to help one sleep peacefully.

Name: Celica
Content: Having a decent campsite is the first step to guaranteeing good sleep quality outdoors.

Name: Celica
Content: Once Noise-Cancelling Construction is triggered, <color=#57f0fb>all</color> of Wanshi's sleep plans will be <color=#57f0fb>shortened by 2 time units</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Fatigue poses a significant hindrance to achieving good sleep quality.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>time grids selected</color> before Support Request will be shortened by 1 time unit.

Name: Celica
Content: After <color=#57f0fb>resetting</color> or clearing a stage, you can tap here to enter Celica's Class and view tips.

Name: Rosetta
Content: This is a temporary Garrison Point of our forward base. It will serve as the <color=#57f0fb>operation starting point</color> in each area.

Name: Rosetta
Content: Areas outside the operational range cannot be explored.

Name: Rosetta
Content: The color of an area represents the <color=#57f0fb>type of resources</color> available there. Here, Red indicates Military resources. Let us take the first step.

Name: Rosetta
Content: Excellent, now we have obtained our first batch of Military resources. The resources collected <color=#57f0fb>every day</color> will be displayed here.

Name: Rosetta
Content: This is our landing port.

Name: Rosetta
Content: New areas <color=#57f0fb>in the horizontal and vertical directions</color> adjacent to the explored area are within the operational range. Tap to explore them.

Name: Rosetta
Content: Our pioneer team has reported that the area ahead contains Infrastructure resources. Continue exploring forward.

Name: Rosetta
Content: The pioneer team has been waiting for us. Talk to them to gather intelligence.

Name: Rosetta
Content: Guide system malfunction... Restoring...

Name: Rosetta
Content: Welcome to New Sophiasburgh, where a brand-new journey awaits. Hope you are ready.

Name: Rosetta
