Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Amour Concerto</color>, Commandant. Here, you'll team up with Constructs to compete against opponents in a card-comparison game.

Name: Celica
Content: You can view the <color=#57f0fb>match rules</color> here. Rules will change as the match progresses.

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>swap your match assistant</color> here, who will provide gameplay hints during a match.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>match opponent and rewards</color> are shown here. Winning the match will grant you the corresponding rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: The opponent's words may reveal their <color=#57f0fb>match strategies</color>, allowing you to plan your moves accordingly.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, let's begin a match now.

Name: Celica
Content: During a match, both parties have <color=#57f0fb>the same hand</color>. After each party plays their card, they are revealed for comparison.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The opponent's expression may reveal their thoughts.</color> This opponent appears cautious and likely won't play a high-value card.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Drag</color> a card here to <color=#57f0fb>play</color> it.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's play the 4 of Hearts this turn.

Name: Celica
Content: After playing a card, tap Confirm to <color=#57f0fb>finalize your move</color>. The opponent's card will then be revealed for comparison.

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>ask the assistant for help</color> to predict the opponent's move, but you can <color=#57f0fb>only use this once</color> per match.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, it's time to <color=#57f0fb>earn points and claim victory</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: Make your move based on the hint.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to the <color=#57f0fb>Trial of Simulacrums</color>. Babylonia has digitized powerful enemies you fought in the past into a training system.

Name: Celica
Content: You can select enemies and materialize them for training purposes.

Name: Celica
Content: In this trial, enemies have different abilities than their original versions. Tap the button to <color=#57f0fb>switch</color> and view their abilities.

Name: Celica
Content: Some abilities can be practiced individually. Tap <color=#57f0fb>Practice</color> to enter the training stages for specific abilities.

Name: Celica
Content: Before entering the trial, go through the tutorial stages to understand the differences between this trial and regular challenges.

Name: Celica
Content: During trials, characters can utilize unique talents, which are unlocked by completing the trial challenges.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's start with the tutorial battle.

Name: Celica
Content: Each character will activate a fixed, powerful talent.

Name: Celica
Content: In addition, you can use specific characters to challenge the trial and <color=#57f0fb>earn Trial Rating</color> to unlock bonus optional talents.

Name: Celica
Content: At <color=#57f0fb>full Red Tide</color>, certain Nodes transform into <color=#57f0fb>Broken Walls</color> Nodes.

Name: Celica
Content: In this Guild Expedition, defeating the <color=#57f0fb>Cliff Fortress</color> Node unlocks <color=#57f0fb>Red Tide Burst</color>. Clear stages to increase Red Tide.

Name: Celica
Content: You may view the <color=#57f0fb>Image Guide</color> for more details.

Name: Celica
Content: Enemies at the <color=#57f0fb>Broken Walls</color> Node are significantly enhanced.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>Broken Walls effect</color> lasts for a certain duration before vanishing. Clearing Broken Walls Nodes will speed up this process.

Name: Celica
Content: The current Red Tide will carry over into the <color=#57f0fb>Sovereign</color> stage.

Name: Celica
Content: The Stage Sovereign <color=#57f0fb>fills Red Tide</color> when attacked and enters the <color=#57f0fb>Berserk</color> state at full Red Tide.

Name: Celica
Content: After the Sovereign Node is cleared, <color=#57f0fb>a new cycle</color> starts, where stages are enhanced and <color=#57f0fb>increased points</color> will be granted upon clearing.

Name: Selena
Content: Welcome to the <color=#57f0fb>Crouching Cat, Hidden Rat</color> party game, Conductor! This party features 3 maps that <color=#57f0fb>automatically rotate</color> daily at 07:00 (UTC).

Name: Selena
Content: At the end of each game, you will receive <color=#57f0fb>Prestige EXP</color>. Note that you cannot earn EXP after you have reached the daily <color=#57f0fb>limit</color>. The limit is reset at 07:00 (UTC) every day.

Name: Selena
Content: This event introduces a new voting feature. Participating in votes grants extra <color=#57f0fb>Prestige EXP</color>. The voting topic updates every 4 days.

Name: Selena
Content: By earning Prestige EXP, you can increase your <color=#57f0fb>Prestige Level</color>, unlock bountiful <color=#57f0fb>rewards</color>, and gain <color=#57f0fb>more votes</color> in the voting feature.

Name: Selena
Content: For more details, please check out the Image Guide.

Name: Selena
Content: Tap Match to enter the matchmaking queue and look for a game. <color=#57f0fb>Once matched, you will immediately enter the battle</color>.

Name: Selena
Content: More <color=#57f0fb>Active Skills</color> have been unlocked. Experiment with different skills and find out what works best for you, Conductor!

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Shuffling Duel</color>. Strategize your plays and lead your team to crush the odds!

Name: Celica
Content: You can check the <color=#57f0fb>victory requirement and stage objectives</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: Alright, time to kick off the challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's start with a <color=#57f0fb>Solo Battle</color> and team up with Lucia.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>victory target</color> will appear at the center, with <color=#57f0fb>Action Preview</color> displayed above their portrait. The enemy will deal a total of <color=#57f0fb>15 DMG</color> in the next turn!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Hold and drag cards</color> onto the board to play them. Playing <color=#57f0fb>adjacent cards of the same color</color> will enhance their effect. Now, try to play 3 Blue Orb Cards!

Name: Celica
Content: To get started, tap on the enemy's portrait to <color=#57f0fb>switch targets</color>. Focus on taking down enemies with <color=#57f0fb>lower HP</color> first.

Name: Celica
Content: When Lucia is on the field, a 3-Ping will prompt her attack to deal damage and trigger her <color=#57f0fb>Core Passive</color>. Press and hold her portrait to view <color=#57f0fb>skill details</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Lucia: Lotus' Core Passive <color=#57f0fb>draws an additional card after a 3-Ping and doubles subsequent damage for the rest of the turn</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Each card play <color=#57f0fb>costs an Action Point</color>, and your remaining Action Points are shown here. Now, go ahead and finish this match!

Name: Celica
Content: Besides Orb Cards, each character has a unique <color=#57f0fb>Signature Card</color>. Playing it costs an Action Point, and it cannot be played with other cards.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, switch targets and <color=#57f0fb>play the Signature Card to finish off the enemy</color>! Go ahead and finish this match.

Name: Celica
Content: 3-Ping Orb Cards to activate Lucia's [Dual Blades], which can <color=#57f0fb>double the damage of the Signature Card</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Non-Attacker Constructs start a match in the standby position. Swapping active characters <color=#57f0fb>costs an Action Point</color>. Now, tap on Nanami's portrait to switch her in.

Name: Celica
Content: Storm's Core Passive <color=#57f0fb>draws an additional card after a 3-Ping and grants you Armor. Armor absorbs incoming damage before your HP in one turn</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: In contrast to Core Passives, <color=#57f0fb>when standby, a character's QTE will be triggered upon a 3-Ping of the same color</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Red characters' QTEs <color=#57f0fb>restore Action Points</color>, while Yellow characters' QTEs <color=#57f0fb>grant Armor and draw extra cards</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Playing a Red 3-Ping now will <color=#57f0fb>trigger Storm's Core Passive as well as the red character's QTE</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: After triggering a QTE, you can <color=#57f0fb>directly switch this character in at no Action Point cost</color>. Now, tap Lucia to bring her into the field.

Name: Celica
Content: When playing a Signature Card, <color=#57f0fb>if the character is not active, they will switch in</color>. Now, play Nanami's Signature Card and end this match!

Name: Celica
Content: In stages with relatively more enemies, you need to<color=#57f0fb>prioritize Constructs who can deal damage to multiple enemies</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: First, play a Blue 3-Ping. When Liv: Eclipse is active on the field, a Blue/Yellow 3-Ping <color=#57f0fb>heals you</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Liv: Eclipse's Core Passive <color=#57f0fb>deals substantial damage to multiple enemies</color> after any 3-Ping. Let's switch her in!

Name: Celica
Content: Play a <color=#57f0fb>3-Ping</color> again, and you'll take down the most dangerous enemy. Now, go on and wrap up this match.

Name: Celica
Content: Repairer will take a <color=#57f0fb>special action</color> next turn. Press and hold its portrait to <color=#57f0fb>view details</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Some enemies will obtain <color=#57f0fb>special marks</color> in battle. Press and hold their portraits to <color=#57f0fb>view details</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Enemies with [Rigid Body] take only 1 DMG per hit. You need to play <color=#57f0fb>enough high-value cards</color> to remove the mark.

Name: Celica
Content: From this stage onward, you can use <color=#57f0fb>The True Measure of a Chief</color> to <color=#57f0fb>rearrange the position of any one card in your hand</color>. Now, give it a try!

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Rearrange your cards and play a Blue 3-Ping to negate the enemy's [Rigid Body]</color>. I'll leave the match to you then, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: Press and hold the <color=#57f0fb>enemy target</color> to view the <color=#57f0fb>special marks</color> in this stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Recommended Team</color> to instantly deploy the suggested lineup.

Name: Celica
Content: After unlocking new characters, you can <color=#57f0fb>change your deployed team</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: Each character has a <color=#57f0fb>designated color position</color> based on their class. <color=#57f0fb>Different team compositions</color> unlock unique synergies!

Name: Celica
Content: In Infinite Stage, the run <color=#57f0fb>ends immediately upon defeat, recording your total waves cleared and points earned</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The stage mechanics <color=#57f0fb>rotate each wave</color>. Hone your skills in the Infinite Challenge and see how far you can go!

Name: Celica
Content: The opponent seems to be leading with a high-value card this time. Without knowing their exact card, let's counter with a low-value one first.

Name: Celica
Content: Use the <color=#57f0fb>Ace of Hearts</color> to counter, and <color=#57f0fb>save the high-value card</color> to finish off your opponent.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Permanent Rift</color>, Commandant. Tap here to enter the Shattered Floes chapter.

Name: Jetavie
Content: You can view the <color=#57f0fb>advantageous Elemental type</color> of the current Ice Rink here.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Quick Deploy</color> to swiftly deploy the recommended characters.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Alright, let's start the challenge!

Name: Jetavie
Content: Tap to view the enemies of the current Ice Rink.

Name: Jetavie
Content: In <color=#57f0fb>Permanent Rift</color>, you can equip Add-Ons to increase your members' strength.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Time to battle!

Name: Jetavie
Content: The Add-On in this stage is free. Tap to select it.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Enter Floor 2 after clearing Floor 1.

Name: Jetavie
Content: This floor is comprised of 3 <color=#57f0fb>Point stages</color> and 1 <color=#57f0fb>Boss stage</color>. Tap the Point stage first.

Name: Jetavie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Point stages will provide Add-On Points</color>. Choose and deploy the right characters to battle and gain Add-On Points.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Tap the button to view the available characters.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Prioritize characters with the Recommended tag to gain as many Add-On Points as possible.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Radiant Points gained from the Point stages are shown here.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Spend Radiant Points to apply Add-Ons to increase the power of your members in the Boss stage.

Name: Jetavie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Radiant Points spent on this floor will be refunded in the next floor</color>. Spend them wisely to increase the strength of your characters!

Name: Jetavie
Content: Complete all Point stages of this floor to begin the Boss stage.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Enter Floor 3 after clearing Floor 2.

Name: Jetavie
Content: The Boss on the <color=#57f0fb>Top Floor</color> of the Ice Rink has <color=#57f0fb>Star Objectives</color> you can attempt.

Name: Jetavie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The higher the score you get from the final Boss stage, the more floors you can Auto Clear in the next Ice Rink.</color>

Name: Jetavie
Content: Challenge yourself to get an even higher score!

Name: Jetavie
Content: This operation has two Ice Rinks. Complete <color=#57f0fb>the Shallow Ice Rink to challenge the Core Ice Rink</color>.

Name: Jetavie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The chapter score equals your final Boss battle score at the Core Ice Rink.</color>

Name: Jetavie
Content: Deploy the right members based on the <color=#57f0fb>advantageous Elemental type</color> of the Ice Rink.

Name: Jetavie
Content: The current stage provides an environmental buff to your team. Tap here to view more details.

Name: Jetavie
Content: You can also join the team and fight alongside Jetavie again, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Tap or drag</color> to place goods into the crate.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap and <color=#57f0fb>rotate</color> goods to change their directions.

Name: Lucia
Content: Tap to confirm and <color=#57f0fb>place</color> the goods.

Name: Lucia
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Packing completed</color>. Tap the button to see the results.

Name: Lucia
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Lazy Delivery</color>, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Content: In this event, you will need to help the office reach the quotas. Let's start with the <color=#57f0fb>Onboard Training</color>.

Name: Lucia
Content: Let's get familiar with how to <color=#57f0fb>pack goods</color> first.

Name: Liv
Content: We're open for business! From now on, we will be getting <color=#57f0fb>a lot of orders</color>! Let's get to the <color=#57f0fb>first order</color> now!

Name: Liv
Content: Place one more good in here to complete this order!

Name: Liv
Content: Tap to confirm and <color=#57f0fb>place</color> the goods.

Name: Liv
Content: Tap to <color=#57f0fb>submit the order</color>!

Name: Liv
Content: There are still goods to pack. I'll leave them to you, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Content: Some orders are bigger than others. Choose <color=#57f0fb>a bigger crate</color> for these!

Name: Liv
Content: There are hints on the goods indicating the best crates for them. Watch out for the <color=#57f0fb>colors</color>!

Name: Liv
Content: It's all you now, Commandant!

Name: Lee
Content: Plan your schedule ahead and stay <color=#57f0fb>efficient</color> during <color=#57f0fb>peak seasons</color>! Orders will get <color=#57f0fb>canceled automatically</color> if they aren't completed in time!

Name: Lee
Content: Are you ready, Commandant?

Name: Lee
Content: Random events will happen in the game. <color=#57f0fb>Gain different buffs based on the choices you make in the events!</color>

Name: Lee
Content: During events, the game will be paused automatically. Tap anywhere blank to exit the event and the game will start promptly.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Tap to enter Point Stage.

Name: Jetavie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>There is a limit to the number of Radiant Points earnable</color> in each Point Stage.

Name: Jetavie
Content: The limit applies even if deploys members meet all requirements.

Name: Jetavie
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Challenge the Boss with Jetavie!</color>

Name: Jetavie
Content: If the Boss's affixes are too much to handle, <color=#57f0fb>pick the right Add-On Units to remove the corresponding affixes</color>.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Talents are now available.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Clear the corresponding chapters to unlock new Talent modules.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Each <color=#57f0fb>Talent can be enhanced up to three times</color>. Enhancement <color=#57f0fb>Tokens can be obtained via the Ice Rink</color>.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Unlocking and enhancing Talents will <color=#57f0fb>give you advantages in battle and boost members' Battle Power</color>.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Lamp Oil can be used to enhance characters through Talents.

Name: Jetavie
Content: Talents <color=#57f0fb>increases members' Battle Power and makes it easier to earn points in Point Stages</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Blade on the Waves</color>, Commandant.

Name: Vera
Content: In this event, you will need to help Vera gather the supplies required to traverse the high seas. Let's enter <color=#57f0fb>Mist</color>!

Name: Vera
Content: Let's start with the basic rules and controls.

Name: Vera
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Start</color> to enter the first stage.

Name: Vera
Content: Swipe up, down, left, right, or press WASD to move the cubes.

Name: Vera
Content: Cubes with the same number can merge into one. Upgrade the board after combining the <color=#57f0fb>target cube - Constellation Analysis</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: Swipe left to move the cube. Cubes with the same number can merge into one.

Name: Vera
Content: Upgrading the board will retain the largest cube, remove all other cubes, and grant <color=#57f0fb>Enhanced Moves</color>. Cubes generated from Enhanced Moves have <color=#57f0fb>greater</color> numbers.

Name: Vera
Content: Enhanced Moves will <color=#57f0fb>reduce by 1</color> every time a numbered cube is generated. When Enhanced Moves is reduced to 0, the numbers generated by the cubes will <color=#57f0fb>reset to default</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: The game is over when the board is upgraded to its highest level and the Constellation Analysis of that level has been merged.

Name: Vera
Content: Try to merge the target cubes as quickly as possible within the limited moves!

Name: Vera
Content: That effect is the creation of a specific <color=#57f0fb>special cube - Compass</color>. The number there is the cooldown timer of the special cube.

Name: Vera
Content: Compass can <color=#57f0fb>merge with any numbered cube once</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: That effect is the creation of a specific <color=#57f0fb>special cube - Beacon</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: Merging with a Beacon can <color=#57f0fb>double the value of adjacent cubes</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: That effect is the creation of a specific <color=#57f0fb>special cube - Hub</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: When any adjacent block's value doubles due to a Beacon, <color=#57f0fb>Hub's value is also doubled</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: That effect is the creation of a specific <color=#57f0fb>special cube - Power Core</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: When a Power Core is merged or its value is doubled, <color=#57f0fb>add 1 to the number</color> below it.

Name: Vera
Content: That effect is the creation of a specific <color=#57f0fb>special cube - Ballast</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: Ballast <color=#57f0fb>cannot be moved</color>. When a Ballast cube is merged or its value is doubled, it <color=#57f0fb>becomes a Power Core</color>.

Name: Rosetta
Content: This time, we have a new starting effect, [Proxy Campaign], which allows you to conduct Proxy Battles at the cost of Military Development Rate.

Name: Rosetta
Content: Footprint introduces new [Awaken] Talents. You can unlock them to gain more power.

Name: Rosetta
Content: By unlocking the corresponding Talent, you will earn a new resource, <color=#57f0fb>Awaken Points</color>, during gameplay. Collect more Awaken Points to unlock a brand-new ending!

Name: Rosetta
Content: The new feature <color=#57f0fb>Sand Table Reconstruction</color> allows you to rewind the operation to a few days ago and recover some resources spent during that period.

Name: Rosetta
Content: In specific routes of Awakening Tundra, the <color=#57f0fb>Sand Table Collapse</color> mechanic will be activated.

Name: Rosetta
Content: After a set number of rounds, tiles with a crash countdown will <color=#57f0fb>collapse permanently and become inaccessible</color>. Please plan your moves carefully.

Name: Vera
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Game of Thorns</color>. Let's get started!

Name: Vera
Content: Select a chapter first.

Name: Vera
Content: Time to battle!

Name: Vera
Content: The objective is to <color=#57f0fb>defeat the enemy King</color> with me. It may hide off-screen sometimes, so we need to <color=#57f0fb>force it out by defeating its minion pieces</color>!

Name: Vera
Content: An enemy piece has locked onto me. Let's find a way to evade it!

Name: Vera
Content: There are some green blocks around. They seem safe.

Name: Vera
Content: Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>cast a skill</color> and attack the enemy.

Name: Vera
Content: I can build <color=#57f0fb>Rage</color> by dealing damage, which <color=#57f0fb>enhances my skills and movement</color> after reaching a certain amount. However, note that casting enhanced skills costs Rage.

Name: Vera
Content: Without further ado, let's <color=#57f0fb>evade the enemy attack</color>!

Name: Vera
Content: Pinch to adjust camera height, and tap here to switch views.

Name: Celica
Content: In the <color=#57f0fb>first two battles</color> of Chapter 3, you can use <color=#57f0fb>Auto Clear</color> after meeting the specific conditions.

Name: Celica
Content: To <color=#57f0fb>activate Auto Clear</color>, the following conditions must be satisfied: \nClear <color=#57f0fb>the selected enemy for the first time</color>;\nReach a <color=#57f0fb>specific total score under the corresponding difficulty</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Once all conditions are satisfied, tap <color=#57f0fb>Auto Clear</color> to automatically clear the current stage.

Name: Celica
Content: In this chapter, you can choose <color=#57f0fb>any three</color> of the six enemies to challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Each battle has <color=#57f0fb>independent difficulty levels</color>. You may choose any difficulty to challenge.

Name: Celica
Content: Each enemy has 4 difficulty levels. You must <color=#57f0fb>clear or auto-clear</color> a difficulty level to unlock the next one.

Name: Celica
Content: Each difficulty level has corresponding <color=#57f0fb>points</color> and <color=#57f0fb>bonus affixes</color>. Choose wisely to earn a higher score.

Name: Celica
Content: After defeating the enemy, you must assign a character to <color=#57f0fb>station</color>. Stationed characters <color=#57f0fb>cannot participate in subsequent battles</color> but will provide a powerful <color=#57f0fb>bonus</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Armored Up</color>, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: In each chapter, you will need to use a single team to <color=#57f0fb>challenge three enemies consecutively</color>, with each enemy having a unique affix.

Name: Celica
Content: This challenge consists of 3 chapters. In each chapter, you will need to use a single team to <color=#57f0fb>challenge three enemies consecutively</color>. Let's start with the first chapter.

Name: Celica
Content: Before starting, you need to select a <color=#57f0fb>Chapter Weakness</color> to design your combat strategy around it.

Name: Celica
Content: Once chosen, the weakness <color=#57f0fb>cannot be changed</color> during the challenge. Let's go.

Name: Celica
Content: All affixes will <color=#57f0fb>carry over to subsequent battles</color>. Tap here to view them.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Boss enemies</color> have a <color=#57f0fb>special ability</color> that they <color=#57f0fb>will use to enhance other enemies</color> in subsequent battles.

Name: Vera
Content: This is an <color=#57f0fb>Infinite Stage</color> with unlimited moves.

Name: Vera
Content: This is an <color=#57f0fb>Infinite Stage</color> with unlimited moves.

Name: Vera
Content: This is an <color=#57f0fb>Infinite Stage</color> with unlimited moves.

Name: Vera
Content: When the board levels up, the accumulated numbers will <color=#57f0fb>convert into Enhanced Moves</color>. This way, you can earn more Enhance Moves.

Name: Vera
Content: We're surrounded. Let's make our way out first.

Name: Vera
Content: A new skill has been unlocked. Use <color=#57f0fb>Block</color> to <color=#57f0fb>nullify</color> the incoming damage. A successful Block <color=#57f0fb>grants bonus Rage</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: Strategic blocking is key to survival. Let's press on.

Name: Vera
Content: A large wave of enemies incoming! Time to test my new skill.

Name: Vera
Content: Boss spotted. Tap to inspect it.

Name: Vera
Content: You can view its upcoming actions here.

Name: Vera
Content: Tap here to check its skill. The Boss prioritizes casting off-cooldown skills first, so make sure to evade in advance.

Name: Vera
Content: The Boss is ready to cast a skill! Tap to view the skill info. It will only act <color=#57f0fb>after we move</color>.

Name: Vera
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Danger zones</color> will be highlighted on the <color=#57f0fb>board</color> before the skill is cast. Make sure to evade it!

Name: Vera
Content: Now, time to take down the enemy!

Name: Vera
Content: This section reveals the timing of the <color=#57f0fb>Boss skill execution</color>. <color=#57f0fb>"Upcoming"</color> means that skill will be cast in the following round.

Name: Vera
Content: After completing all chapters, tap here to unlock the Hard Mode. There will be no more rewards but you can still challenge this mode to earn higher scores!

Name: Vera
Content: Commandant, could you help me <color=#57f0fb>connect</color> past and the present memories?

Name: Vera
Content: Ready when you are.

Name: Vera
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Connecting matching icons</color> helps me organize my thoughts.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Limit Break</color>, Commandant. Tap here to enter the new chapter.

Name: Celica
Content: View the <color=#57f0fb>environmental effect</color> of the current stage in Environment.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to close the Environment interface.

Name: Celica
Content: During this Limit Break, the Affixes you choose will apply to <color=#57f0fb>all enemies</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The stage's level is associated with the <color=#57f0fb>Analysis Points</color> of the enemies and the Affixes. Claim rewards in <color=#57f0fb>Event Mission</color> after clearing the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's choose our enemies and Affixes before entering the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Some stages have <color=#57f0fb>restrictions on deployable characters</color>. Choose the right enemies and Affixes based on the available characters, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: You've cleared all the stages in Easy Mode and unlocked <color=#57f0fb>Hard Mode</color>, Commandant. Tap here to change the difficulty.

Name: Celica
Content: You can gain <color=#57f0fb>additional levels</color>in Hard Mode, but it will also be more challenging. Let's do our best and get more rewards!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Bytebite Invasion</color>, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: Select a chapter first.

Name: Celica
Content: We need to collect as many Byte Crystals as possible before we escape to get a high score.

Name: Celica
Content: We can take a look at the items and enemies appearing in this stage before we begin.

Name: Celica
Content: You can collect Sneakers in this stage and gain increased movement speed! Running through enemies can further increase its speed and refresh its duration.

Name: Celica
Content: The enemies in this stage are pretty mediocre, but more powerful enemies might show up in the future. Pay attention!

Name: Celica
Content: Now, time to escape!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to the event: <color=#57f0fb>Devils Never Die</color>. In this Character Trial, you can try out the <color=#57f0fb>two collaboration characters</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the switch button to switch to the <color=#57f0fb>"Dante"</color> Character Trial interface.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the switch button again to return to the <color=#57f0fb>"Vergil"</color> Character Trial interface.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Gray Raven, you're awake.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: This is the Mysterious Tavern, a pure land I created—and your resting place on this journey.

Name: Gray Raven
Content: Where is this...?

Name: Nirvatia
Content: You look confused. Have you forgotten something?

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Touch my pendant—it will help you recover your past memories.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: There's no need to rush. We... have plenty of time...

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Welcome to Wreck-It Shark-speare, rawr!

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Let's start with the Trial Performance, rawr!

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Alright, let's start the challenge, rawr!

Name: Selena
Content: This is our target, Conductor! When blocks <color=#57f0fb>fill an entire row, they'll be cleared and grant points</color>.

Name: Selena
Content: <color=#57f0fb>You will enter Fanaticism state when the Fanaticism gauge is full</color>. Go ahead and start your performance!

Name: Selena
Content: <color=#57f0fb>When entering Fanaticism</color> state and with <color=#57f0fb>every move</color> after entering Fanaticism state, <color=#57f0fb>blocks will rise to eight rows</color>.

Name: Selena
Content: Select a block! When selecting a block, if it has space to the <color=#57f0fb>left or right</color>, you can move it <color=#57f0fb>horizontally</color>.

Name: Selena
Content: Each time you enter Fanaticism, your <color=#57f0fb>next 3 moves will be enhanced</color>.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: <color=#57f0fb>But Shark-speare will prevent blocks from going over eight rows</color>, so you can relax, Commandant, rawr!

Name: Selena
Content: <color=#57f0fb>When exiting Fanaticism</color> state, Shark-shark will <color=#57f0fb>bring blocks back down to two rows</color> and reset all blocks below the board.

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Tap here to view all the blocks that will appear in this game, rawr!

Name: Shark-speare
Content: Tap here to change the character for this game. Once you've decided, start the game, rawr!

Name: Selena
Content: When a square preview appears at the <color=#57f0fb>top</color>, a block of the displayed type will appear and <color=#57f0fb>fall</color> to the top of the existing squares after your move.

Name: Selena
Content: This looks like quite the challenge, Conductor. Get ready and we'll face it together!

Name: Selena
Content: It's a red note block! <color=#57f0fb>Clear it to obtain measure reduction items!</color>

Name: Selena
Content: Sometimes blocks will <color=#57f0fb>rise two rows at once</color>, so you'll need to plan ahead, Conductor.

Name: Selena
Content: Let's try operating this block.

Name: Selena
Content: When entering Fanaticism state, <color=#57f0fb>consuming enhanced moves can enhance Item</color> effects. Try it out now!

Name: Bianca
Content: Commandant, this stage features a new special block called <color=#57f0fb>Legato Block</color>. Tap here and we shall read the description together.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: During your journey, your choices will determine how events unfold.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: First-time encounters will grant additional rewards, so keep an eye out for events you haven't handled before.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Combat in <color=#57f0fb>The Godfall Revelation</color> is fully automatic. You'll need to equip your characters with suitable <color=#57f0fb>Skills</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Sigils</color> to face powerful enemies.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After starting the mission, you'll first enter the preparation phase, where you can equip your characters with <color=#57f0fb>Skills</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Sigils</color>.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Select</color> to acquire Skills, or directly <color=#57f0fb>drag</color> Skills to skill slots.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Characters can equip up to 3 <color=#57f0fb>Skills</color>.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Before your first battle, you need to choose one Skill from three options.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: During the Skill selection phase, you must choose one Skill to proceed to the next stage.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After every few battles, you can choose an additional Skill.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Gray Raven, you can use <color=#57f0fb>Coins</color> to purchase Sigils from me.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Initially, characters can equip 3 Sigils. You can spend Coins to unlock more slots. A maximum of 10 Sigils can be equipped simultaneously.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Tap unlocked slots to unlock additional slot capacity. After each battle, slot unlock prices will <color=#57f0fb>drop</color> by 3 Coins.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Tap Sigils to view their detailed descriptions.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: All Sigils provide basic Attack and Health stats.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Sigils are divided into 4 rarity levels: <color=#4da27b>Green</color>, <color=#437cad>Blue</color>, <color=#d65fb3>Purple</color>, and <color=#ee762e>Orange</color>. The higher the rarity, the stronger the stats and effects the Sigils provide.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: In addition, Sigils also provide special effects that enhance Characters' efficiency in battle.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: In the Scorched Borderland, Sigils have been divided into different <color=#57f0fb>schools</color>.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: If you find Sigils you like but are short on Coins, you can also choose to <color=#57f0fb>Freeze</color> those Sigils.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: If there's nothing here that suits you, you can also choose to <color=#57f0fb>Refresh</color> them, and I'll find some new Sigils for you.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After completing your preparations, tap <color=#57f0fb>Start Battle</color> to enter combat.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Equipping Sigils can improve Character stats and grant additional Passive Skills. Smart Sigil combinations are the key to victory.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: As your journey progresses, Sigils that amplify entire schools may appear in the Mysterious Tavern.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Even after starting a battle, Frozen Sigils will not disappear.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After winning battles, you can obtain Mammon Platinum Coins as rewards based on your performance, which can be used to exchange for Items in the Shop.

Name: Gray Raven
Content: The battle on the train went smoothly, but what happened after that?

Name: Gray Raven
Content: Did you save me, Nirvatia?

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Are you feeling better now?

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Yes, your injuries were severe. Next time... don't push yourself so hard.

Name: Gray Raven
Content: I've remembered some things, but they're still a bit hazy.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After all, you were unconscious for a long time. Your body still needs to adjust.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Take a little rest. I'll show you around this inn.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Countless adventurers seeking wealth and glory roam these ashen lands. You can choose to join the Desperado Clash and test your skills against them.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Alternatively, you can choose to continue staying in the inn, embark on the path of Revelation, and continue the campaign against the gods with your companions.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Go talk with your companions. That might help you recover your memories better.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: War Watanabe—he's an excellent warrior. Embark on a journey with him and unveil the past you two share.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Investigating events allows you to collect clues. Once all clues are gathered, you can begin the intelligence analysis phase.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: So, explore new events as much as possible and gather all the clues.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: You've now collected enough clues. Go deduce and analyze your past with him.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Tap the core clue.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Choose the most appropriate answer and reveal the truth of the event.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After choosing an answer you're satisfied with, tap Deduce to answer the question.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Desperado Clash</color>, Gray Raven.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: In <color=#57f0fb>Desperado Clash</color>, you can choose a Character, equip Skills and Sigils, and challenge other adventurers.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Select a Character to use for this challenge.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Each Character has independent Points. Participate in <color=#57f0fb>Desperado Clash</color>, defeat enemies to gain Points, and raise your <color=#57f0fb>rank</color>.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: There are a total of 5 ranks in Desperado Clash. Increase your rank during the event period to earn honor rewards.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Let's try a challenge.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Tap Action Time to find your opponent.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Winning Battles improves your ranking and grants you generous rewards in the long run.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: After winning a Battle, you can obtain 1 <color=#57f0fb>Badge</color>. Accumulate 10 Badges to complete the challenge.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Losing a battle deducts 1 <color=#57f0fb>Health</color> point. After losing 5 Health points, the challenge will end early.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Ending the challenge early will still award points based on your performance in battle. So don't fear failure—glory belongs to those who dare to challenge.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Gray Raven, you've gathered four knights to fight beside you. The time has come—let the angels see the banner of rebellion we raise.

Name: Celica
Content: Bianca: Crepuscule features dual forms.

Name: Celica
Content: You can configure her starting form as needed.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Threading Arts</color> is now open for business! Let's help Discord complete tailoring commissions! We'll start with <color=#57f0fb>Thorough Conception</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's begin with Liv's Commission 1.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap to select a thread ball. Tap again, or tap on an empty space, to cancel the selection.

Name: Celica
Content: After selecting a <color=#57f0fb>thread ball</color>, you can tap adjacent ones in a cross shape to select continuously. You can also <color=#57f0fb>hold and swipe</color> to select continuously.

Name: Celica
Content: Thread balls of different colors have <color=#57f0fb>different values</color>. Once they enter the basket, you gain the corresponding points.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>reset the stage</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to get <color=#57f0fb>hints</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Hold and swipe</color> to select 4 thread balls.

Name: Celica
Content: You've gathered <color=#57f0fb>4 thread balls</color>, exactly the <color=#57f0fb>capacity of the basket</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Connect all thread balls to the basket to complete the commission.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Textile dyes</color> can dye ordinary thread balls into their colors.

Name: Celica
Content: Put the purple textile dye into the basket.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can see the <color=#57f0fb>number of uses</color> left for the dye.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can see the <color=#57f0fb>basket's capacity</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the <color=#57f0fb>textile dye</color> at the finish point and <color=#57f0fb>drag</color> in a direction to fire the dye.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap the brush and fire to the left to dye the blue thread balls. Once dyed, their <color=#57f0fb>value increases</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: First, put the purple textile dye into the basket.

Name: Celica
Content: Now fire the dye to the right to color more purple thread balls and gain more points.

Name: Celica
Content: First, put the red raw cotton spool thread into the basket.

Name: Celica
Content: Drag the raw cotton spool thread at the finish point to the right to <color=#57f0fb>fill all empty spaces</color> in that direction with red thread balls.

Name: Celica
Content: First, put the purple bloom dye into the basket.

Name: Celica
Content: Drag the bloom dye at the finish point to the right to dye <color=#57f0fb>all thread balls</color> in that direction and their connected same-colored ones.

Name: Celica
Content: Gray thread balls <color=#57f0fb>cannot be dyed</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Textile dyes</color> can <color=#57f0fb>dye at a distance</color>, but gray thread balls will <color=#57f0fb>block</color> the firing path.

Name: Celica
Content: The key is to <color=#57f0fb>move the gray thread balls</color> out of the way to clear a path for firing.

Name: Celica
Content: Only thread balls that are <color=#57f0fb>the same color and adjacent</color> can be dyed together.

Name: Celica
Content: These 3 thread balls here are <color=#57f0fb>isolated.

Name: Celica
Content: Move them to make them <color=#57f0fb>adjacent to the thread balls on the left</color> so you can dye more purple ones at once.

Name: Celica
Content: This <color=#57f0fb>textile dye</color> can be used for <color=#57f0fb>2 dyeing actions</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Wishing Upon a Star</color>. How do you want to spend our time together?

Name: Celica
Content: You can view the <color=#57f0fb>match rules</color> here. Rules will change as the match progresses.

Name: Celica
Content: You can <color=#57f0fb>swap your match assistant</color> here, who will provide support during a match.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>match opponent and rewards</color> are shown here. Winning the match will grant you the corresponding rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, let's begin a match now.

Name: Celica
Content: During a match, both parties have <color=#57f0fb>the same hand</color>. After each party plays their card, they are revealed for comparison.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The opponent's reactions can reveal their card play.</color> A frown usually means they played a low card.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Drag</color> a card here to <color=#57f0fb>play</color> it.

Name: Celica
Content: Play the 3 of Hearts in response.

Name: Celica
Content: Play a card, then tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm</color> to flip and compare cards.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The opponent looks confident.</color> They probably played a high card.

Name: Celica
Content: In each match, you have <color=#57f0fb>one chance to change your card or your opponent's card</color>. Let's hit them with a surprise.

Name: Celica
Content: Change the opponent's card to <color=#57f0fb>Ace of Hearts</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Play the <color=#57f0fb>2 of Hearts</color> to defeat your opponent.

Name: Celica
Content: Now, it's time to <color=#57f0fb>earn points and claim victory</color>!

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Tactical Override</color>, Commandant. Tap here to enter character chapters, each of which can only be challenged with <color=#57f0fb>specified characters</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Characters gain <color=#57f0fb>Hypertune buffs</color> within chapters. Clearing each difficulty <color=#57f0fb>unlocks</color> new Hypertune effects.

Name: Celica
Content: During challenges, complete <color=#57f0fb>Enthalpy Verification</color> to <color=#57f0fb>claim rewards</color> in the event interface.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>first stage</color> of each chapter <color=#57f0fb>teaches</color> Hypertune mechanics. Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>prepare for battle</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Pathfinder</color>. In this operation, you have to control your characters to solve the puzzles and complete your missions.

Name: Celica
Content: Please select an operation stage first. I'll explain the rules after you enter the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap Battle Preparations to enter the preparation screen.

Name: Celica
Content: This operation features Veronica. She can unlock different abilities in different chapters!

Name: Celica
Content: If you're ready, let's enter the stage and check it out!

Name: Celica
Content: This is the character you're controlling.

Name: Celica
Content: Swipe the screen to move your character until they hit an obstacle.

Name: Celica
Content: This is a Rattan Ball. Use your character to <color=#57f0fb>hit</color> it to move it. <color=#57f0fb>Hit</color> the ball to indirectly interact with other units or tiles.

Name: Celica
Content: In new chapters, Veronica with unlocked abilities can interact differently with the Rattan Ball or other units.

Name: Celica
Content: This is your destination, which is closed now. You can pass through it before it opens.

Name: Celica
Content: The Kuroro with a mark is the <color=#57f0fb>key</color> to clearing the stage. Once you hit it, it will be destroyed and your destination will open.

Name: Celica
Content: If you're stuck, call me for a hint!

Name: Celica
Content: In this chapter, Veronica has <color=#57f0fb>Physical and Fire</color> types. She starts as <color=#57f0fb>Physical</color> but can switch using <color=#57f0fb>Type Switch</color> in the stage.

Name: Celica
Content: This is Veronica's <color=#57f0fb>Shadow</color>. It has <color=#57f0fb>Fire type</color> abilities and moves in the same direction as her.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Path of Buried Wishes</color>. You'll face all kinds of enemies in competitive battles. Let's start the first one!

Name: Celica
Content: Different rounds give <color=#57f0fb>different Add-ons</color>. Equipping them changes how a character plays.

Name: Celica
Content: The right Add-ons will help you fight smarter, Commandant. Let's start the first battle!

Name: Celica
Content: You must clear all arena challenges in a competition to unlock the next one.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's enter the arena.

Name: Celica
Content: 不同竞技场插件<color=#57f0fb>掉落概率</color>不同，某些竞技场通关后会获得<color=#57f0fb>首通插件</color>，选择合适的队伍挑战吧。

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Dropped Add-ons</color> must be <color=#57f0fb>equipped</color> to take effect. Go ahead, Commandant, try equipping one now.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to equip a character with an Add-on.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Tap</color> an Add-on from the list to equip it.

Name: Celica
Content: To <color=#57f0fb>unequip</color> an Add-on, you must select the currently equipped Add-on first.

Name: Celica
Content: Then tap <color=#57f0fb>Unequip</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: You can also use the <color=#57f0fb>Recommended</color> feature to automatically select Add-ons and equip them.

Name: Celica
Content: Bear in mind that each character has their own <color=#57f0fb>load limit</color>. Characters with no load capacity left cannot equip more Add-ons.

Name: Celica
Content: The <color=#57f0fb>load</color> required to equip the Add-on is displayed here.

Name: Celica
Content: Characters' <color=#57f0fb>load</color> capacity will <color=#57f0fb>increase</color> as you complete more battles.

Name: Celica
Content: Clearing arenas or just letting time pass generates Charge Points. Once Charge Points are halfway full, you can open <color=#57f0fb>one</color> Charge Chest for Add-on rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Charge Points are capped at 360. Don't forget to open your Charge Chests after battles, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: In <color=#57f0fb>Add-on Codex</color>, you can <color=#57f0fb>purchase</color> Add-ons that may drop from cleared competitive battles.

Name: Celica
Content: Select an Add-on.

Name: Celica
Content: Use <color=#57f0fb>Premium Vouchers</color> to directly <color=#57f0fb>unlock</color> the selected Add-on.

Name: Celica
Content: Once you have collected a certain number of Add-ons, you can enhance them in <color=#57f0fb>Competition Guide</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Collect the required number of Add-ons of the specific star level</color> to activate the corresponding enhancements.

Name: Celica
Content: Each Add-on star level has five enhancements. Tap to view details.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to view a summary of all <color=#57f0fb>active</color> Competition Guide enhancements.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to Competition Enhancement, Commandant. Here you can spend <color=#57f0fb>Carnage Crystals</color> earned in battle to boost <color=#57f0fb>your whole team's stats</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Here, you can <color=#57f0fb>adjust how enhancement points</color> are allocated. All enhancements have the same limit, which increases as you progress through the competition.

Name: Celica
Content: After adjusting, tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm & Save</color> to apply the changes.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to save the current setup as a <color=#57f0fb>template</color>. You can quickly switch between setups by applying templates.

Name: Celica
Content: Each type of enhancement has a <color=#57f0fb>special stat</color> that can assist you in further exploration.

Name: Celica
Content: Once the enhancement has reached <color=#57f0fb>the required level</color>, the special stat will be unlocked.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, you might have already noticed that 6-star Add-ons have a unique Quantum Affix system. They start with 2 unlocked Quantum Affixes by default.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap unlocked affixes to spend <color=#57f0fb>Premium Vouchers</color> and reset them.

Name: Celica
Content: Spend more <color=#57f0fb>Premium Vouchers</color> for a targeted reset, which guarantees the same affix type with new stats.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to unlock more Quantum Affixes.

Name: Celica
Content: You can consume Simulation Crystal Flux to unlock the Quantum Affix or reset already unlocked affixes.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Cat Grab</color>, Commandant. Ship modification capabilities are greatly boosted during this event. Let's get started!

Name: Celica
Content: Ships can undergo <color=#57f0fb>Structural Modifications</color>, granting powerful abilities. These new structures can also be expanded and upgraded.

Name: Celica
Content: In one Cat Grab operation, a ship can take <color=#57f0fb>up to 4 Structural Modifications</color>. Commandant, select one to start.

Name: Celica
Content: After selecting, tap <color=#57f0fb>Confirm Modification</color> to apply the selected modification.

Name: Celica
Content: Ships can also undergo <color=#57f0fb>General Modifications</color>, which appear randomly and grant different buffs.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Refresh</color> to randomly regenerate the General Modification list. Not happy with the modifications available? Try refreshing.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>The number of General Modification selections increases with Cat Grab progress</color>. Commandant, please choose one General Modification for now.

Name: Celica
Content: Selecting Structural Modifications again lets you <color=#57f0fb>upgrade Structural Modifications already selected</color>, boosting their effects.

Name: Celica
Content: You can also <color=#57f0fb>select new Structural Modifications</color>. <color=#57f0fb>Multiple Structural Modifications can be active at the same time</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view <color=#57f0fb>selected Structural and General Modifications</color>. Tap here to <color=#57f0fb>view modification details</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: The effects of both Structural and General Modifications can be stacked. Commandant, Commandant, build the strongest combo and finish the Cat Grab!

Name: Liv
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Fluffy Snooze</color>, Commandant.

Name: Liv
Content: In this event, you will enter Liv's dream to help guide the lost sheep back to their pens and ease her stress. Let's begin by entering the <color=#57f0fb>Light Sleep</color> phase.

Name: Liv
Content: Let's start with the basic rules and controls.

Name: Liv
Content: Tap <color=#57f0fb>Start</color> to enter the first stage.

Name: Liv
Content: Swipe up, down, left, or right, or use the WASD keys to move the blocks. When two blocks with the same number meet, they will merge into one.

Name: Liv
Content: Merge <color=#57f0fb>Bubble Blocks</color> to create the <color=#57f0fb>Target Block - Dormant Wavelength</color> and upgrade the board.

Name: Liv
Content: Merge <color=#57f0fb>Bubble Blocks</color> to create the <color=#57f0fb>Target Block - Dormant Wavelength</color> and upgrade the board.

Name: Liv
Content: Upgrading triggers a <color=#57f0fb>clearing effect</color>. The <color=#57f0fb>arrow directions on the Bubble Blocks</color> decide which areas will be cleared.

Name: Liv
Content: After the upgrade, the <color=#57f0fb>Bubble Blocks remain</color>.

Name: Liv
Content: Blocks with values less than 4 will turn into <color=#57f0fb>Clump Blocks</color>. These can only be cleared by colliding other blocks into them.

Name: Liv
Content: Swipe down to move the blocks and trigger a merge.

Name: Liv
Content: After the upgrade and clear, you will get boosted moves. During this boost, blocks with <color=#57f0fb>higher values</color> will appear. Each time a new block is generated, your <color=#57f0fb>boosted move count</color> goes down by one.

Name: Liv
Content: After an upgrade, the <color=#57f0fb>arrows on the Bubble Blocks</color> will refresh and point in new directions.

Name: Liv
Content: The game ends when you reach the highest Dream Level and successfully create the Dormant Wavelength block for that level.

Name: Liv
Content: Try to merge the target blocks as quickly as possible within the limited moves!

Name: Liv
Content: This effect creates a <color=#57f0fb>special block called a Star Block</color>. The number shown indicates how many moves are left before the block appears.

Name: Liv
Content: Star Blocks can <color=#57f0fb>merge once with any numbered block, except Bubble Blocks</color>.

Name: Liv
Content: This is an Infinite Stage. There is no move limit.

Name: Liv
Content: This effect creates a <color=#57f0fb>special block called a Heart Block</color>.

Name: Liv
Content: The Heart Block activates after <color=#57f0fb>3 merges</color>. It instantly doubles the size of nearby Bubble Blocks to their target value and triggers a board upgrade.

Name: Liv
Content: Perform 3 downward merges to activate the Heart Block.

Name: Liv
Content: This is an Infinite Stage. There is no move limit.

Name: Liv
Content: This effect creates two <color=#57f0fb>special blocks: Hot Blocks and Cold Blocks</color>.

Name: Liv
Content: These two special blocks have no merge restrictions. Merging blocks of different types will create a block of a random type.

Name: Liv
Content: When an upgrade is triggered, you can choose to clear either all Hot Blocks or all Cold Blocks. The remaining blocks will turn into Star Blocks.

Name: Liv
Content: This is an Infinite Stage. There is no move limit.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: In this brand-new season, I've prepared some exciting new items for our guests: <color=#57f0fb>Accessories</color>.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Once you enter a match, you can choose your first Accessory. Each one has powerful effects that grant either a <color=#57f0fb>Battle Power boost</color> or generous <color=#57f0fb>economic rewards</color>.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: If you're not satisfied with the current items available, tap here to refresh them.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Knights can earn <color=#57f0fb>EXP</color> through battle to level up.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Level up a knight to increase their <color=#57f0fb>ATK and HP</color>, and gain extra <color=#57f0fb>Accessories</color> at Levels 5 and 9.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: Of course, I've also prepared some additional services for our guests.

Name: Nirvatia
Content: At the Mysterious Tavern, you can spend Mammon Coins to purchase the EXP needed for upgrades, instantly raising your knight's power to the next level.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Stellar Rush</color>, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: A <color=#57f0fb>racing match</color> is held every day. You can check the schedule here. When the race starts, enter the event screen to watch it live.

Name: Celica
Content: Before the race begins, tap here to make your <color=#57f0fb>prediction for this race</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, you can tap on any item in the list to switch your current <color=#57f0fb>prediction</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view each character's <color=#57f0fb>stats</color> and <color=#57f0fb>skills</color>. Signature Moves can only be used during the race after collecting enough <color=#57f0fb>Signal Orbs</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Tap here to predict the winning character. If your <color=#57f0fb>prediction is correct</color> after the race ends, you will receive token rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's return to the race venue.

Name: Celica
Content: The event includes both <color=#57f0fb>Points Races</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Knockout Races</color>. You can view the full schedule here.

Name: Celica
Content: Before the Points Races end, you can make predictions for the <color=#57f0fb>overall competition results</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Party Booster</color> includes missions and a shop. You can earn tokens by making predictions and completing missions, then exchange them in the shop for rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Welcome to <color=#57f0fb>Stellar Rush</color>, Commandant.

Name: Celica
Content: The race schedule has concluded. Commandant, you can now view the full <color=#57f0fb>replay</color> from here.

Name: Celica
Content: <color=#57f0fb>Party Booster</color> includes missions and a shop. You can earn tokens by watching the replays and completing missions, then exchange them in the shop for rewards.

Name: Celica
Content: Commandant, you can claim your free <color=#57f0fb>SFX Coating</color> and <color=#57f0fb>Weapon Coating</color> here.

Name: Celica
Content: Here you can view detailed explanations of <color=#57f0fb>character stats</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: In the schedule, you can watch <color=#57f0fb>replays</color> of finished matches.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's return to the track.

Name: Celica
Content: Let's check out the <color=#57f0fb>Points Race</color> schedule.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete just a few more missions to unlock <color=#57f0fb>No. 21: Feral</color> as a teammate for Crimson Weave.

Name: Celica
Content: When in your squad, <color=#57f0fb>No. 21: Feral</color> will increase Crimson Weave's <color=#57f0fb>damage dealt</color>.

Name: Celica
Content: Complete more missions to obtain <color=#57f0fb>No. 21: Feral</color> faster.

Name: Celica
Content: Missions complete. Time to claim your new teammate for <color=#57f0fb>Lucia: Crimson Weave</color>.

Content: Claim <color=#57f0fb>No. 21: Feral</color>

Content: Don't forget to claim your important rewards.

Content: Crimson Weave's <color=#57f0fb>6★ Exclusive Weapon</color> and <color=#57f0fb>6★ Memory</color> are within reach.
